text:
Stay here for Honeymoon 3 days 2 nights, 23 - 25 February. I really recommended Ziva Villas for honeymoon. 

Datang dari Manado dan saat tiba di Bandara langsung dijemput oleh Kru dari Ziva Villas 
datang dari Manado dan langsung dijemput oleh kru dari Ziva Villas. Selama perjalanan dari Bandara ke Villa, diberikan Air Mineral dan Krunya sangat ramah. 
Sampai di Villa disambut langsung oleh resepsionis dan karena kami mengambil paket honeymoon, jadi kami langsung diberikan daftar list menu untuk Sarapan pagi dan menu untuk tomantic Dinmer, resepsionis di Ziva Villa sangat membantu terutama ketika menjelaskan menu yang tersedia. Sampai di Villa yang akan ditempati langsung disediakan Welcome drink dan Honeymoon cake yang Ulaaalaaaa, Lekker. Untuk pelayanan mulai dari kedatangan, check in sampai check out ramah, tepat waktu dan sungguh sangat memuaskan. 
Sarapan pagi yang enak dan bergizi sampai untuk menu romantic dinner pun sangat enak dengan menu Internasional tapi masih sesuai dengan lidah orang Indonesia. Saat Makan malam romantis, kokinya langsung masak di Villa jadi kita bisa menyaksikan bagaimana koki memasak, dan tak ketinggalan dekorasi untuk menciptakan suasana romantis benar - benar totalitas dan four thumbs up. 

Untuk fasilitas semuanya tersedia, kolam renang big size untuk ukuran 2 orang sudah sangat besar, Air kolam yang begitu jernih. Selain itu segala fasilitas terjaga dengan baik, Wi-fi dengan kecepatan yang baik untuk download, segala peralatan makan dan minum bahkan untuk memasak tersedia di Private Kitchen, oh iya untuk Afternoon tea juga kuenya sangat enak. Mulai dari Breakfast sampai Dinner semuanya tepat waktu dan teratur dengan baik. 

Suasana di Villa yang begitu Nyaman dan tenang yang jauh dari kebisingan, serta ada pelayanan untuk drop off ke tempat wisata di seputaran seminyak. 

Saya dan suami sangat puas dengan pelayanan dan fasilitas yg diberikan selama kami menginap di Ziva Villa. Tidak menyesal memilih Ziva Villa, bahkan kami pasti kembali menginap disini.

Mercy dan Kris

text:
Kami menginap 2 malam di villa 1 bedroom . Ada 6 villa 1 bedroom dan 1 villa 3 bedroom di tempat ini. Meskipun 1 bedroom , fasilitasnya lengkap dengan dapur terpisah oleh kolam renang. Fasilitas kamar lengkap dengan TV dan sofa besar.

title: Villa yang nyaman untuk keluarga

text:
Awal bulan Juni 2017, saya dan suami menghabiskan 3 hari 2 malam di Ziva villa karena mendapatakan deal honeymoon di weddingku wedding fest.. 
Dengan harga yang kami bayar, kami mendapatkan pelayanan yang memuaskan..

-Kami di jemput oleh pihak hotel dengan mobil avanza dan di mobil di sediakan air dingin untuk memulai hari kami.. sambil ngobrol singkat, tak kerasa 25 menitan kami sudah sampai di villa
- sesampainya, Villa kami belum siap karena memang kami tiba jam 10 pagi.. dan normalnya check in jam 2 siang. Apa lagi, paket honeymoon kami mendapatkan rangkaian bunga utk menghias ranjang dan bathtub..  Recepsionis membantu kami check in, sambil menyusun jam2 fasilitas yang kami dapat seperti couple spa/motor/dinner/breakfast.. 
-Servicenya memuaskan di hari pertama karena sluruh staff yang kami temui sangat ramah.. villanya pun sangat spacious.. Kolam renang cukup besar untuk one bedroom villa.. 
- pelayanan sangat tanggap saat kamu menelpon ke resepsionis untuk morning call atau pesan makanan.. 
-lokasi sangat strategis karena bisa jalan kaki ke jalan kayu aya dan seminyak square.. dengan motor, sangat dekat ke pantai petitenget..
- Kami menginap di villa 4, AC kamar sangat dingin dan suasannya sangat sunyi serasa tinggal sendiri walaupun seluruh villa full book.. jadi kalo mau relax sangat recomended banget.. 

Hanya satu masalah yang saya ingin sampaikan..
- bathtub di luar ukuran cukup besar.. saat kami ingin berendam air panas, sangat lama untuk memenuhi tub nya.. dan waktu tub nya baru 1/4 terisi, air panas sudah tidak keluar lagi dan air shower pun spertinya kehabisan air panas.. mungkin bisa di perbaikin.. akhirnya km gak jd pake tub nya..

Banyak yang komen gedungnya sudah tua.. memang disini villanya gak terlihat baru.. gedung sudah agak tua.. tapi menurut saya dan suami sangat nyaman dan kami mungkin akan kembali lagi kesini.
title: Short but sweet honeymoon getaway

text: Saya bersama istri beberapa tahun lalu pernah ke tempat ini untuk beberapa hari. Kami dijemput dari bandara oleh driver villa dan sungguh layanan dan fasilitas di villa ini sangat baik. Begitu memasuki villa, terdengar alunan musik khas bali dan kami diberikan kue dan juga welcome drink juice segar. Menu makanan disini dimasak oleh koki di dalam dapur dekat kolam renang, dan kami juga mendapat massage traditional yang juga sangat menyenangkan. Villa yang kami gunakan paling depan dengan ubin model kayu, terlihat mewah.Terkadang, mengingatnya ingin kami datang kesini lagi. Demikian dan semoga membantu.
title: Villa yang bagus

text:
Saya sangat merekomendasikan Ziva Villa untuk Honeymoon. Saya mengambil paket Honeymoon dari sebuah pameran wedding di Jakarta. Paket tersebut banyak plusnya, antara lain transportasi dari dan ke Airport, Dapat Free paket Romantic Dinner (Side Pool Dinner) & Free Spa Massage (Booking dulu). Saya menyewa vila dengan 1 Bedroom (Couple Villa).

Nilai Plus dari Ziva Villa :
- Tempatnya Cukup Bersih & terawat
- Suasananya Tenang karena jauh dari tempat keramaian
- Tempat tidurnya OK & bersih
- Kamar mandi, Closet & Towel & Bersih. Kamar mandi menggunakan shower.
- Kolam Berenang bersih walau lantainya sedikit keset (Kasar)
- Pelayanan baik & Ramah
- Sangat Private cocok utk Honeymoon
- Air Bersih & tidak berbau
- Room Service OK hasilnya (Semua diganti baru) & petugasnya Sopan

Nilai Minus dari Ziva Villa :
- Breakfast-nya kurang OK, hanya telor mata sapi saja yang dimasak langsung. Nasi Goreng   
  sudah dingin saat disajikan. 
- Romantic Dinner-nya menu kurang OK, Rendang & Ayam Betutu (tidak ada romatis2nya).
  padahal saat kami daftar di pameran mereka menunjukan menunya american food (Steak & 
  Fries)
- Antar jemput dari dan ke airport menggunakan sopir & mobil carteran (Sopir tembak) bukan
  menggunakan mobil fasilitas villa.
- Untuk makan di luar Ziva sangat sedikit pilihannya, kecuali warteg. 
- cukup jauh dari objek wisata (harus naik kendaraan)
- sulit mencari taksi/ kendaraan umum di depan villa.

Saran :
- Beli snack sebelum ke Villa karena Ziva Villa jauh dari tempat belanja.
- Saat Romantic Dinner jangan habiskan seluruh wine-nya, karena 'jatah' anda hanya 1 gelas 
  saja bukan 1 botol. Jika anda meminum lebih dari ‘jatah’ anda akan dikenakan biaya 1 botol.
- Jika perlu taksi bisa minta bantuan resepsionis. Dengan menunggu cukup lama untuk taksi datang.
- Sewa Motor, Mobil atau Sopir jika menginap di Ziva karena sulit transportasi.
- saat Free Massage minta anda di massage di outdoor jangan di dalam ruangan, karena jika di dalam 
  ruangan (kamar tidur) bisa bau minyak urut semalaman.
title: Bulan madu yang romantis di Ziva Villa...

text: Vila berbintang 4 yang luar biasa, mulai dari layanan jemput di bandara, cek in, dan pelayan pribadi. Lokasinya dekat dengan Ultimo, Mykonos, dan lain-lain. WIFInya sangat bagus. Kolam renangnya lebih besar dari vila berkamar 1. Suasana vila lebih enak di malam hari.
title: Vila bintang 4

text:
Suami saya dan saya menginap di Ziva untuk 13 malam bulan Oktober - Saya memesan Ziva karena ulasan yang saya baca di TripAdvisor. Mungkin standar kami tinggi, tapi kami sangat kecewa. Kami ditawarkan paket bulan madu, yang termasuk pijat, 1 makan siang, 1 makan malam, 1 hari jalan-jalan, 1 mini bar gratis saat kedatangan seperti 1 bir dan 1 minuman ringan dan tentu saja sarapan yang dimasak di villa setiap pagi. Bahasanya tepat dan juga tidak tepat tergantung siapa yang membacanya dan level apa. Mari saya mulai dari villa, ini sangat usang. Furniturnya terkelupas, tirainya jorok dan perawatannya secara umum sangat buruk. Kolamnya sangat licin dan suami saya dua kali terpeleset ketika disana.

Jika Anda ingin teh atau kopi Anda harus pergi ke dapur di luar karena tidak ada fasilitas di dalam villa. Tingkat kebersihannya sangat buruk, bahkan ada sarang dan telur laba-laba dibawah kasur. Anda mendapat 2 handuk kecil kering untuk mandi, 2 handuk hitam untuk ke kolam renang, dan 2 handuk tangan dan keset mandi. Tidak ada tempat bilas, tidak tahu apakah ini kebiasaan di Indonesia. Sarapannya cukup biasa, dan tidak dimasak oleh koki. Mereka juga tidak memperbolehkan Anda mendapat masakan barat dan masakan asia. Semua porsi sudah dikontrol. Mereka sering lupa apa yang kita pesan dan jusnya diantarkan dalam keadaan hangat. Makan siangnya sama saja dengan sarapan.

Makan malamnya ok dan hanya menyenangkan karena ada lilin dan kelopak bunga mawar di tengah kolam renang. Pijat bisa dilakukan di kasur kamar dan di tempat santai dan tidak di meja pijat diluar seperti di gambar. Ini sangat tidak nyaman untuk saya dan suami saya. Perjalanan satu hari yang sudah termasuk biaya tidak diorganisasi dengan baik. Mereka punya supir yang tidak tahu harus berbuat apa. Ketika mereka punya daftar tur yang bisa dipesan, dia tidak tahu apa-apa. Mereka juga tidak punya brosur untuk tamu lihat sehingga mereka tahu mereka ingin pergi kemana. Walaupun mereka menawarkan jasa antar ke bandara dari Seminyak, ini dilakukan dengan penuh kesabaran dan akhirnya kami memesan taksi kami sendiri.

Kami harus terus meminta untuk gelas minuman karena yang mereka punya di villa adalah gelas wine. Gelasnya selalu diambil ketika mereka membersihkan kamar dan kami harus terus meminta mereka untuk mengembalikannya. Kami juga meminta es batu. Hal ini harusnya sudah diberikan di hotel manapun. Minuman ringan dan bir yang harusnya gratis tidak pernah kami terima dan hal tidak mengenakkan lainnya adalah mereka memberi kami tagihan terpisah untuk satu bir dan satu botol air mineral. Kami juga meninggalkan 1/2 botol Gin, 3 bir, dan 2 tonic. 

Apakah kami senang? Tidak. 
Akankah kami merekomendasikan? Tidak. 
Akankah kami kembali lagi? Tidak. 
Kami membayar USD 4199 untuk 13 malam.

Mereka tertawa dan kami pergi dengan rasa kecewa.
title: Kecewa.

text:
Saya dan suami menginap di Ziva Villa selama 5 malam pada bulan Juni dan sangat menyukainya. Vila modern dengan konsep terbuka ini cukup besar dengan dinding hingga jendela langit-langit di semua empat sisinya. Kami mendapati area lounge berguna untuk relaksasi dan membaca ketika kami ingin beristirahat dari berjemur di bawah matahari di kolam. Bagian luar ada dapur terpisah dan paviliun makan tempat hidangan di sajikan, kamar mandi luar ruangan dengan bak mandi sunken dan lemari besar. Kami menghabiskan banyak waktu di kolam sepanjang villa ini dan cukup besar untuk berenang. Ingin sekali ada rak barang tambahan karena tidak ada di mana pun.

Pelayanan spa disedikan di villa-mu, yang cukup baik untuk perawatan facial saya tetapi suami saya merasakan tidak nyaman untuk pelayanan pijatan di ranjang.  Tidak seperti pengulas lain, kami tidak pernah mendengar lalu lintas dan jalanan di mana lokasi vila berada tidak sibuk.  Makanannya cukup baik tetapi banyak tempat bagus yang dekat yang layak dikunjungi.  Kami dapat sangat merekomendasikan Ziva Villa  dan kami pasti akan tinggal di sini lagi.

title: Holiday
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
The good:
Very spacious villas with many amenities. Very large swimming pool in the villa. The bathrooms are very spacious and clean. The layout of the villa we stayed at was very well planned out. The staff at the villa were very friendly. The location of the villa is very central, only a few minutes walk to the main streets of Seminyak. Beds were comfy although we had to order a soft pillow since the ones already in the villa were a bit too firm for us. One of our favorite parts of this villa was the fact that all the walls around the villa were glass. So waking up in such a villa was perfect and you get direct access to the pool right near the bed and the bathroom as well. The bathtub was also amazing and located right next to the pool. The breakfast is brought to your villa every morning, you get to choose between Indonesian breakfast and American breakfast the day before and they bring it to your villa at the time you desire. They also give you the option of having a floating breakfast in the pool which was nice. 

The bad:
The villa did seem a bit old and could use some very minor maintenance. The shower didn’t drain properly so when I took a shower, the water filled up on the bottom of the shower and ended up over flowing into the toilet area and rest of the bathroom. The faucets in the bathroom seemed to need to be renewed, the water would run a bit weak at times. 
In addition to the above, we stayed at a different villa in Seminyak before that provided more amenities in the kitchen area such as a water cooler for example. They had also provided residents with ground coffee rather than just Nescafé packets. These would have been nice additions to have in this villa. 
The mini fridge in the room was a bit too loud. We could hear it turn on and off during the night which at some times was a bit annoying. 

Conclusion:
I would strongly recommend this villa to anyone planning on staying in Seminyak. Everything was completely perfect during our stay despite the very minor negative things I mentioned above. They had no negative impact on our stay whatsoever. Also keeping in mind the prices were very fair considering the quality and location of this villa.
title: Great villas!

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
visited Ziva villas in early october. 
- Communication before the date is pretty smooth, always answered. very informative. 

-reservation includes 1 way transport, as i only stayed for 3 days. informed them that i wanted to be dropped off on the last day instead of getting picked up. They agreed. 

- arrived at the property, shown to the villa within minutes. Im amazed on how big is the size of the pool. during the few days of stay, the pool is always clean. 
Found the set up of the layout weird, You can get in from the pool from the bathroom side, but there is no step / ladder getting up to the sunbeds. 
If you are having a swim and somehow needs to attend to the front door to let someone in, You will need to jump up onto the rocks and walk pass the dining area ( tiling floor, beware its slippery while its wet ). 

- informed that they provide complimentary afternoon tea daily between 16.00 - 1800 pm. We only had a chance to take it on the first day, as on the other days, we are always out during those times. They provide cake and tea. 

- room has 2 large size air conditioner, but due to windows all around, during sunny days, room still feels abit warm. You will need to close all curtains to keep the room cold. Entrance to the room and entrance to bathroom is divided by sliding glass door. For some reason, the glass door to the bathroom is very heavy. Will need attention to this. 

towels are always changed daily ( hand towels, swimming towels and bathing towels ). 
towels are always clean and in great condition. 

they provide soap, conditioner and bathing foam in a glass bottle, can be very slippery when you have wet hands. Found the water pressure to fill in the bath tub are very low and slow. takes a good 30 mins to get to half of bath tub. 

Breakfast is great. But You will have to book in slots. As they have limited kitchen staff etc. So if you dont get your breakfast order in early, you will get some odd times breakfast times ( could be up to 9.30, 10am etc ). 

I brought my own pool floaties. I asked them to help me inflate them, they did. 
They also helped deflate it on the last day and folded it back into the box for me to bring back. 

Our private butler Mr Agus / Bagus, was very attentive and informative. 

location of villa is excellent, very close to many famous restaurants etc. 

Overall, i will recommend this villa to others. and will revisit the in nearest future.
title: Well maintained property with excellent staff.

text: Room was stunning. Staff was friendly and helpful. They cooked breakfast in our room in the   morning and arranged transport to/from the airport. They really paid attention to detail in this paper. The lush vegetation surrounding each room really helped block out noise and created a peaceful place to escape. Couldn't have asked for more - we loved our stay here!
title: Great place!

text:
We only stayed for one night in Seminyak due to having other accomodation but this was the perfect base for us! It was about a 5-10 minute walk to Seminyak square where everything is happening! It was easy to get taxis and find everything - so location was great! 
We had a 1 bedroom villa and were amazed at how big the pool is in comparison to other villas we have stayed at in Bali! They definitely make the most of the space they have! The room opens up right onto the pool - felt extremely luxurious! 
100% would recommend this villa for anyone staying in Seminyak who want their luxury hideaway amongst the madness of seminyak!
title: The perfect base for Seminyak!

text:
Went for a weekend trip with my sister for a full-on relaxing trip at a nice villa with good food, and Ziva was exactly what I expected. We stayed at a 1 bedroom pool villa. Beautiful villa. The place is walking distance to many restaurants and Seminyak beach is only a 5-10 minute car ride away. 

Ziva was located at a slightly odd place, plop in the middle of a kind of dingy road (just like any other luxurious villas in Bali lol) but once you enter, staff and service is just amazing. They provided one way airport transportation for free, free shuttle to Seminyak beach (5-10 minute ride depending on traffic), complementary breakfast (which was a LOT better than what I expected, afternoon tea, and they even gave us floaties for the pool. 
Breakfast was exceptional, didn't expect much because it was complementary but honestly I think it was better than some of the more expensive food we had at restaurants there. You can get it as a floating breakfast or served at the table. Loved the freshly squeeze juices. We had room service for dinner twice. Burger was meh but their indonesian/balinesian food was great, and cheap too!!

Wifi was a little patchy which was a little disappointing but it was okay because i had data roaming. 

Oh and we took a cab from our villa to a restaurant, which was literally a 5 minute drive but made us pay 300k rupiah!!!!! When an Uber costed me 15k rupiah. Avoid taxis at all costs. They WILL con you. Take an Uber even if you have to wait a little longer. 

Great place to just relax and enjoy your villa.
title: Amazing villa with extremely friendly staff and service

text:
We checked-in to this hotel as a newly engaged couple from the night before! We really wanted the rest of our holiday to be magical, comfortable, convenient and relaxing. Ziva was able to deliver on all counts.

The welcome at the reception was great. They checked us in fairly quickly, carried our luggage and lead us to our private villa. The walk from the reception to Sarga Villa #5 was beautiful-there were arched green plants that led all the way down. When we entered, we saw that we had a giant pool to ourselves and a deck with sun-beds to tan or relax on as well as a covered-outdoor kitchen area where they cooked us breakfast every morning. Somehow, they found out we just got engaged the night before and set up a dining area outside with flowers around the table. The pool had a floating heart made of flower petals. When we entered our villa, we were greeted with a towel-swan display and flower arrangement on the bed. Sounds cheesy, but it was a great feeling. But the best part was that the TV already had a screensaver displayed on it of me kneeling down asking my now-fiancé to marry me-it was a picture of the moment of the proposal from the night before! They got a hold of it and used it on our TV screen. I was so happy because I scored major brownie points with the fiancé.

We made full use of the easy-access to the pool from our bed. Yes, you read that right-the sliding window-doors next to the bed opened up in to the pool. The TV had good channels to watch, including HBO and some other action movie channels which made for easy watching at night before bed. We had free and easy-to-connect-to Wi-Fi and free water as well. Behind us, we had another sliding door with covered access to a large closet, vanity area and stone bath tub. Even here they wowed us again by having a drawn bath filled with bubbles rose-petals in the shape of a heart. We were able to access the pool from this area as well. The other side included a large sink, outside standing shower and toilet across. This “outside” aspect to the villa was amazing as we had plants and greenery all around us. Every area of our villa was private to us only-the walls were high and covered well.

In the evening they sent their team with cooks to make us a celebratory steak and lobster engagement dinner, served with wine and dessert at our convenience. Everything was cooked at that moment that we were sitting at the dining table. They really helped us create some magical memories!

We had to fill out forms to indicate what we wanted to eat and drink for breakfast the next morning and what time we wanted to eat at. They had a lot of food and drink selection for us. The location is amazing-we were a 10 min easy walk from one of the main streets in one direction, and Seminyak Square was an easy 15 min walk in the other direction. We walked to La Favela, had a great night of clubbing with drinks and dance, and walked back home absolutely safe-and-sound. Other days we cabbed to various hot spots and walked back home as it was nearby and the walk was easy. We had a modern-looking convenience store across the road, a nail-salon for the fiancé next to us, and shops and restaurants on either side.

Since it rained a bit, there were issues with the Wi-Fi (not their fault) but they quickly provided us with a portable router that give us Wi-Fi access. They were quick to help us with everything that we needed.

Ziva has indeed made our first trip to Bali so memorable and so amazing. Given the option to stay at the W or here, we definitely recommend staying here without a shred of doubt as they give you their undivided attention, care and top-notch quality service.

Thanks, Ziva team and see you soon!

Mack
title: PERFECT for couples young or older; BEAUTIFUL VILLAS with so much space and located walking-distance from major areas

text: We just stayed 10 days here in the 3 bedroom villa.  We had a very relaxing and enjoyable stay.  Great location. I have read the last few reviews about locking etc but there are safes and you can lock the access to your villa. The staff, Ire, Komang and all the staff we encountered were friendly and helpful. breakfast had a good variety.  As a family of 5 who have previously stayed in resorts such as the W it was so nice to have our own space and pool.  Depends what you are looking for but we loved it and would definitely come back. Maybe not as fancy as your upmarket resort but we enjoyed the privacy and space.
title: Lovely relaxing, great staff

text:
My wife and I had the pleasure of experiencing Ziva Villas recently.
We can not speak highly enough about all the amazing staff and the beautiful villa.
The location was walking distance to the beach and all the bars and restaurants.
We loved the cooked breakfasts in our villa each morning and the 12 metre swimming pool.
We will be returning with the children (maybe).
title: Second Honeymoon
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
We stayed here for 9 nights at the start of our honeymoon. Location wise it is fantastic, being tucked away from the busy areas however still close enough to walk for a meal or drink. Villa itself is large and the pool is large, couldn't open your eyes under the water due to the strong chemicals used however we found this an issue at every pool we had in Bali. 

The staff are amazing and very friendly. We had them make bookings for us without an issue. 

Villa is very large and private. Would recommend Ziva to anyone
title: Nice quite spot for a honeymoon
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: The villas is in a good location close to Seminyak Square, however the villa was very badly designed.  We only stayed one night had major problems getting internet had to get maintenance in at 11pm as could not lock main door so they had to drill hole in floor.  Next morning again no internet also no phone service. To get to the pool lounges one had to hop in pool with towels on head to get to the other side and getting in and out of the pool on the side where lounges were was an excerise...no steps.
title: Disappointed

text: The Villa looked impressive when we booked it.  It is clean, the staff are good, however, we could not lock our villa, so we had a technician in our room at 11 pm drilling holes in the tiled floor to allow us to lock our room.  The front door to the Villa is away from the main part of the sleeping accomodation and as it was raining, you have to go out get wet to let the staff in.  The pool is huge, ridiculously so......if you want to laze on the lounges by the pool you have to swim your towels...or anything else you may want across the pool, there isn't an easy way to get to the lounges.  The dining area is outside which is fine but it is sunken with no steps to get down 😳.......really poor layout.  Our phone didn't work in the Villa and reception is a long way from the villa.  The location is fine, close to main Seminyak...but it is quiet.  The sleeping part of the villa is glas on 4 sides so it's a bit fishbowl like.
title: Worst designed villa ever

text:
Stayed here a in early April for 2 nights and upon arrival the reception is simple and on top of a staircase.  Due to the price we paid we were expecting something a bit more flashy and luxurious, not to say it wasn't very comfortable, but the facilities of the building are falling apart and you can tell that it is reaching 10 years old.  The tiny single bathroom at reception is quite disgusting and we were a bit surprised at it. The location is great, a very short walk to Seminyak Square and we didn't use the shuttle bus. 

Photos on the website are pretty on point but they don't show you how old the building and construction is. When you stay you'll see quite a few things broken (Wooden sliding doors get stuck very easily in Villa 5, cracking walls in the outdoor bathroom and mould, broken cabinets and rusting closures within the doors in the bedroom.)  The sliding doors really need to be replaced as it was most annoying trying to get in and out and keep the air con inside, and to maintain privacy if you get a little sick.

Staff were great and friendly, always helpful and no issue. It is more management that needs to invest in fixing up the small issues in each villa if they expect to charge upwards >$300 a night for a villa. We stayed in a villa in ubud for $85 and it was much the same and better value for money. The pool was great and cleaned daily. Not enough hooks/drying towel racks in the bathroom.

Just a note they have little ceramic shower gels in the bathroom which I'd recommend not using as they are very slippery and one got broken, costing us 175000 IDR as a flat fee from management. A bit of a high cost for such a tiny amenity.

We had a good stay, not amazing but not terrible. Probably wouldn't stay here again as there are other properties at similar prices that are in better condition. Consider paying less elsewhere and not feel a bit ripped off. 

Note: On Expedia this hotel is also called Ziva A Boutique Villas"
title: Nice stay and great staff, disappointed with maintenance of the property, less value for money

Faulty sliding doors to get to the outdoor bathroom

text:
My husband and I recently stayed at Ziva Villa as part of our honeymoon stay in Bali, it was a nice stay and if the price was right we would definitely stay again.  

Pros: 
The Villas are located in a fantastic part of Seminyak with only a 5 minute walk to the heart of Seminyak Square. 

The villa pool is absolutely amazing, they are one of the biggest i've seen for a one bedroom villa in Bali. 

The Staff are really helpful. 

Cons: 
If i'm going to be honest, the breakfast was a let down for us. Although there is a lot to choose from, the quality could be a lot better for the price you pay for the villa. Our food was quite oily, food mostly came out cold, milk was forgotten with our tea and no water was provided at breakfast time. If this could improve, would be a great addition. 

The whole villa is surrounded by windows which has curtains to draw close, with the exception of one area to the bathroom where sunlight comes through. Would be good if this could have curtains too. 

Tip: 
Try and ask for Villa 4. It has an L shaped pool and is away from street traffic.
title: Ziva Villa a nice stay

text:
Thank you Ziva Villa for making our stay in Bali perfect! 

The pool was huge and clean, the whole villa is just really beautiful and modern. Words can't explain how much I love this villa. Very close to Seminyak area as well, around 15 mins walk to Seminyak Square. The butler came in the morning to make us breakfast, we had breakfast by the pool.

This is minor but the bathroom area is semi-outdoor with no actual door so some water spilled out during shower. 

Would definitely recommend anyone to stay at here. Can't wait for our next trip to Bali and to stay at Ziva again.
title: Loved every bit of it!

text: I had a honeymoon trip to Bali, and we decided to choose Seminyak area, Ziva villas fullfil our expectation while we only see the pictures through their website. We really love their wide pool and also the cooking show in the morning.

text:
We stayed in Ziva villa this week for 8 nights for our honeymoon. We are really disappointed. Overall the villa is not 5 star as they describe. The pool is amazing, the bed ok, but its totally missing something else that other villas in Seminyak offer. One big negative was the outdoor bathroom, it really needed sliding doors to keep it cool and keep the bugs out. There is not much lighting in the villa, especially the Bathroom area so very hard to do your make up at night if your headed out. Also no mirror in bedroom area. 
The breakfast was ok, we skipped it most of the time and headed to a cafe for something more substantial. 

Twice we returned home at night with no power in the villa, and another day no tv reception for the entire day.

The BIGGEST disappointment was that we had $200 Australian money stolen from the in room safe. We had triple counted our money the morning we left for our honeymoon, after 2 days, we exchange some currency and we noticed $50 missing from a bundle, a few days later, same again, this time $100 missing... so we got all our money out from the safe and found another bundle short $50. 
They were taking the small amounts so it was not as obvious. 
After this we emptied our safe. But then we got done again. This time, we had accidentally left some money in my husbands shorts on the floor of the bathroom, we thought it will be fine.. they wont touch our clothes on the floor...we returned later that day.. and the money was missing. Luckily it was only less than 200k rupee. 

Also they offer a free Seminyak shuttle, but the driver is never available. 

A really disappointing stay.
title: Disappointed. Do NOT use the in room Safe!!

text:
Upon arrival it was quite rushed and there was no time taken for any small talk. We were immediately instructed that we needed to fill in our breakfast for the next day. We weren't shown round our villa very well which was odd - having stayed in a number of villas in Bali they normally show you round a little better. It all just seemed very formal. The rooms in theory should be nice and don't differ too much from the photos - I personally enjoy the sun and like sitting outside but I felt the outside space could have been designed so much better. There was no sofa to lounge and the area for the sun beds is rather limiting ( as in moving them around etc) - I'm not sure this would matter to people who use the inside space and won't spend much time at the villa. We had used a couple of items from the minibar and the next morning as we were leaving the villas we were presented with a bill for these to sign for - again a little bit pushy as this could have been done by our butler (I think he was our butler) another time. I called reception in order for them to book me a massage and they actually connected me to the massage place and charged me for the call - never had that before when I've stayed at villas in Bali. Every time we wanted to use the free transport they offer around seminyak this was never available. 
The positives were the inside space of the villa - modern etc. I liked the outside bath & didn't have a problem with Mosquitos as mentioned in other reviews. Our butler was accommodating and a nice guy. 
All in all a disappointing experience highlighted by the fact that this was one of the more expensive villas I have stayed in on this trip - all the cheaper alternatives I enjoyed so much more. It just didn't have that luxurious feel and really is missing something big.
title: A little disappointed

text: I love the bright, clean, stylish interior and the long pool, which is kept very clean and is wonderful for real swimming.  The landscaping is very nice and staff are so friendly and helpful.  Their afternoon tea quality is also very good.  There is a shuttle, but it's not always available as it's primarily for picking up people from the airport and perhaps tours. Sometimes the car was available but no extra staff to drive us.  We used it once during our four nights.  Some other properties offer free shuttle service within Seminyak and the immediate area, which is convenient as many taxis try to rip you off. A more available shuttle would have been helpful. At least it's walking distance to many really nice restaurants and shops in the area, however the beach is a bit far for walking and the nice restaurants around Petitinget are too far to walk.  The big negative is the outside bathroom, as others have also said.  You are attacked by mosquitos in the shower, in the toilet area, while brushing your teeth, putting on makeup, etc. It is a battle to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night because mosquitos inevitably follow you back in to the room and bite you all night. It also never feels really clean although they clean it thoroughly.  The wardrobe is very small and also outside, and mosquitos fly out when you open it. We ended up keeping our things in our suitcases the four nights inside the room, which is not so convenient.  It would have been nicer if there were sliding glass doors so one would have the option to have the bathroom closed or open to the outdoors.  I would go again because the design is so nice and bright, the pool is amazing and the staff are very nice, but I would look first if I could find something similar with an indoor bathroom!
title: Great place, lovely staff, wish the bathroom was inside!

text: well it's very simple and I think that's what makes it special.. I recommend is you need a quiet place to stay.. The service is nice, and the pool is big enough to enjoy. the only bémol is that the room is only accessible from one side of the pool..

text: I stay in Ziva Villas with my friend and my daughter. It was amazing. I've stay in 3 bedroom villa. Each room have bathroom and spacious. Television on master bedroom and living room only. They have enclose living room. The Pool size about 3 x 7 m. They have a private pool. Dining area and kitchen is near pool. There is no refrigerator in the villa. Room service is available. Easy to find restaurant there. Ziva villas located near Kayu Aya street (eat street).  Staff was friendly, breakfast also good. Love to stay there on our next holiday..
title: Nice Villa

text:
We stayed at Ziva Villa for 6 nights, all up the place was nice. Not 100% I’d return, but if the price was right we may consider it.

PROs:
•	The staff are lovely – Augus is extremely caring and attentive to his guests. We really liked him.
•	The pool is long (if you want a long pool make sure you get a villa with a long pool, rather than a L shaped pool). 
•	The bed is very comfortable & the pillows are nice to sleep on
•	The rooms have 2 A/C units in them, so they’re nice and cool
•	The villa’s at the end of the complex, are nice and quite

CONs:
•	Villa 1 is up close to the road, and while we were here the place next door was being built, and the builders looked straight into the villa bedroom, pool & bathroom area. They have also been built out recently, so privacy isn't 100%. But a Pro is that we complained about this & the late the next day they moved us to another villa, which was quiter. We think they put up a higher privacy fence after we moved villas. After we requested, they eventually waived the late checkout fee as a result of having little to no privacy for the first 24hours. 
•	The wooden steps near the kitchen area are very slippery & aren’t scrubbed well – so you may very well take a tumble on them. Be aware of this, you’ll fall fast and hard & it hurts. My husband took a tumble on them & still has a large bruise on this back. 
•	The pools are heavily chlorinated at the outset – so you get quite dry skin from swimming. But during you’re stay the don’t clean the pool very well - so if you’re there a few days, but the end the water will be cloudy enough that you can’t see the bottom of the pool.
•	The food they cook isn’t the best, we got free breakfast & afternoon tea, and one lunch basket. The boiled and poached eggs are served with runny whites, while the fried & scrambled eggs are overcooked. The Toast is served cold & the juice is a little tasteless. Overall it’s not a great breakky – free, but not great. The afternoon tea is a small warmed up piece of chocolate cake, which tastes like a cheap packet mix cake, trust me you don’t need to rush back for it. The lunch basket is also disappointing. Opt for a cheaper room rate & go out for better meals instead. It’s such a shame, as this could be an amazing added extra if the food was cooked with love.
•	The A/C units may leak, which ours did, so don’t put your suitcase under the units.
•	There are a LOT of mozzies there, but they do offer fly spray in the room. Admittedly this isn’t their fault. But you do risk getting eaten alive if when you go to the toilet - that’s outside. And Zika is in Bali, so be aware and be very careful.
•	They don’t have a environmentally friendly policy – so all your towels, sheets & open soap packets are replaced daily. They also have free small water bottles, which would be nicer if they used the 15L water dispensers instead & allowed you to drink from a glass as much as you want & saved on land-fill in the process.
•	The pathway to the villas inside the complex is very uneven and slippery, be careful not to slip.
title: Just know what you're getting before you pay for the room & you'll enjoy it.

text:
My boyfriend and I just finished four nights staying in the Ziva Villas and I can guarantee you won't be disappointed! The room is well air conditioned and everything is very clean, tidy and has a lovely modern feel with a great layout. In the garden around the pool we had two big frangipani trees which flowers would drop into the pool! It looked absolutely beautiful Like they were placed there. 

The staff are lovely and they do a great western breakfast as well as a great traditional Nasi Goreng!

The villa felt very private. They would always call your phone and ring the door bell before bringing breakfast or requesting to clean the room. 

Will definitely be returning!
title: Lovely stay... lovely staff

text:
I stayed here around the end of Oct with some friends in their 3 bedroom villa ( the biggest villa they have ). The Pool is perfect, at that time was rainy days, overall the villa is good, it's just they have no fridge in the dining room ( fridge in each room ). 

water coming from outside the room through the window grating, so the curtains get wet, I don't know whether it was because the hard rain of something.

the rest is OK.. good location, safe, friendly staffs ...
title: Simple, Sleek with great location

photos.caption: one of the room at their 3 bedroom villa, this room closed to the main door.

text:
My husband and I travelled to Bali for our second wedding anniversary and stayed at Ziva Villas in Seminyak. We really wanted a private villa, with a reasonably large pool and a room that was modern and clean, right in the heart of Seminyak. Ziva ticks all those boxes. The pool is so large and worth it, we swam in it every day! The villa is built around the pool, so your view is great from anywhere in the villa. 

Breakfast is cooked daily by an in-house chef in your own villa. This was great and a change from the usual buffet breakfasts. We enjoyed breakfast by our own pool. 

Staff are very helpful at reception and always polite.

The location is also great. It is within walking distance to the one of the main restaurants/shopping strips in Seminyak, so you will save money by being able to walk everywhere. However, the taxis are incredibly cheap, so we still used this option to get out of the humidity. 

Next door to Ziva is a massage/beauty salon. They do really good foot massages at a cheaper price than several other massage parlours we experienced. 

We intend on returning to Ziva on our next trip and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.
title: Brilliant slice of paradise!

text:

Stay together with friends and we are really enjoy it!
Great location in busy life of seminyak with kind of restaurant around the place 
Wifi was good and in villa breakfast was served as the schedule!

Highly recommend this villa for romantic stay in seminyak

title: Amazing hotel and good location

text:
We booked this Villa to celebrate our Honeymoon and it was great. We wanted seclusion, relaxation, quietness and service. We got everything we wanted. We stayed in Villa No: 04. We booked this villa as we didn't want the party life we wanted to enjoy sunbathing, cold drinks, the weather, privacy and the main thing is to just unwind and relax. I would recommend this villa for anyone who would like to do the same. By your choice the villa and the pool can be cleaned daily meaning a clean and enjoyable experience. 

It also has a massage parlour right next door which is very cheap, at 60k Rupiah/Hour which woulds out to be around £4 (GBP) ? There is also a souvenir shop next door and a supermarket to buy your ice creams, snacks and drinks etc. Everything is only a 10m drive away, Clubs, Markets & Restaurants. 

This was our first time in Bali and we didn't know what to expect but it is definitely an experience. The down side to the villa is the bathroom does not have a door, meaning daily you will have a visit from lizards or insects. Nevertheless, all in all it is a great villa. The staff are very friendly and are always at your service.
title: A Relaxation Villa!

text:
Nice Location to stay around. You get to find many many restaurants and pubs around. 
Friendly Staff. They cannot be any better. Always flexible and accommodative. 
Surroundings are very clean. 
Breakfast is good, but repetitive. 
Cleanliness and Maintenance - Housekeeping was clean and neat. 
5 star quality.

text:

text: We stayed at Ziva Villas for the last 8 nights of our honeymoon. We could not of picked a better place to stay. The villas are beautiful and modern and have a different look to other villas in Bali which is why we decided to stay there. The staff are amazing and go above and beyond to make sure your stay is fantastic. The villa is a great size and the pool is huge. It is in a great location and only a short walk to some of the best places to eat in Seminyak. We absolutely loved our stay here and would definitely stay there again.
title: Honeymoon stay

text: Highly recommend as we went for relaxation and Ziva Villas allowed us to do this.  It was great to wake up in the morning and open the large sliding doors and sit on ledge inside and have feet and legs in the private pool while in pyjamas and having a coffee. The villa is so open but so private at the same time. Service was always just a phone call away if we needed it and our host dropped us to most places we wanted to go.  Will be returning.
title: TOTALLY RELAXING
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
This is our second stay with Ziva and we are totally hooked!  Ziva Villa's is pure bliss. We recently returned from 5 days at Ziva and loved every moment.  The villas are so peaceful and beautiful.  The layout is perfect and the huge pool is just amazing.  
The Ziva team are so wonderful, Komang, Julie and the Team made our stay perfect. 
The location of the villa's is spot on, with walking distance to all major attractions in Seminyak. Loved every minute and never wanted to leave!

Until we met again... thank you Ziva
title: Perfection - our home in Bali

text: We stayed in the 3 bedroom villa which was great and had an amazing pool but was let down by the state of the pool decking which was rotting and had loose planks. Service was friendly and helpful, and the overall setting was beautiful. Good location also with some good restaurants nearby.
title: Great villa but needs a refurb
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Nice location..close by shoping centre and restoran,The villa is verry beautiful and big ..staff  is very friendly and polite,the pool was very big..delicious food..was amazing holiday😊😊😊
Will be back again☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺
title: Great villa

text: We stayed in a 3 room villa with 3 couples. Very spacious rooms. Very large and clean pool approx 15m x 5m wide. Very quite & tranquil. Staff extremely helpful, polite and courteous. Nothing was too much to ask for. Extremely satisfied with the exceptional level of service. A hot cooked breakfast was served by staff every morning at our chosen time. Location: right on the door step of dozens of restaurants and alot of the top 5 star restaurants are withing walking distance. Shopping strip a 2 min walk away & Seminyak plaza 6 min walk. Everything is easy if u stay here. Cabs easy to catch & only a 30 min ride to the airport, pickup & dropoff included. Very satisfied & i would definitely stay at Villa Ziva again. :)
title: Great Location, great staff, great room!!
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
My fiancee and I stayed at Ziva for five days during our trip to Seminyak. I will start out by saying that the location is perfect; easily within walking distance of Seminyak beach and bars such as Potato Head, Woo Bar and Ku De Ta. 
We stayed in a one bedroom pool villa, which was beautiful. The pool is fantastic and big enough for two people to swim lengths at the same time. The staff were helpful during our stay; I must give a special mention to Agus, the Head Butler, who spent a whole week after our departure in getting my mobile phone back to England for me.

The only drawbacks were that you have to be willing to move around the villa layout to get the sun for all of the day (but this is actually quite nice); the air-con is a god-send in the Bali heat. The other was that the bathroom supplies (shampoo etc.) were not re-filled during our stay. Both of these things did very little to detract from what was a brilliant stay. I would definitely recommend this villa!
title: A perfectly located villa with an amazing pool

text:
A great villa to stay at in Seminyak. The layout of the villa is great and the pool is sensational. Very big and a perfect temperature.  Bathroom is outdoors (as is popular in Bali) and not particularly user friendly, but certainly not bad either. Staff are all very friendly and helpful. The location of this villa is fabulous, about 5-10mins walk from a raft of great places to eat. The beach is about 15-20mins walk away and given the never ending heat was best reached by taxi.
Overall I would consider returning to this villa when next in Bali. The staff, location and that fantastic pool all won me over!
title: Amazing pool and location
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Love the villa to the max. Staffs are very helpful and speak fluent english. Total of 9 villas only, so its very quiet and privatised. Villas are clean and well maintained, pool is big and you can ask for floats from the villa staff. Breakfast is quite ok. There are massage beside the villa, and its super cheap. Opposite villa is a convenience store, and just nearby there is a chinese restaurant call happy chappy, food is good and price affordable. You can also take a cab to go to nearby restaurants like the hog wild, and its about 10mins or less. Would definitely recommend this villa and would stay there again on my next trip.
title: Worth the price, excellent service
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: The villa was amazing. The decoration and setting was thoughtful, the pool was big and comfy. It's also very close to the Main Street of Seminyark. You can totally feel the resorting style without disappointments. Highly recommended!
title: Epic experience
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Staff was very helpful, pity didn't try their afternoon tea as forgot about it!

Picnic hamper lunch was a nice surprise as didn't expect it.

Wouldn't recommend the in-house spa though, perhaps I'm used to the quality in thai resorts.

All in all, room was gorgeous, it was exactly as depicted in photos.

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Was staying in ziva for a friend's birthday weekend in bali. Fell in love with our amazing villa.. rooms were spacious and very modern.. big swimming pool and very good, convenient location .. just a stone throw away from the busy street of seminyak.
title: Spacious, modern, beautiful villa tucked away in seminyak..
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Walking distance to the center of Simiyak.  Nice and big private pool.  Staff are friendly and the room is so huge that the layout is very nice.  Good connection of wifi.  However, the toilet flushing water is a bit poor.
title: Nice villa with good location
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
The location is nice even though you need to do a bit of walking to get to the beach. The room is very nice, the pool is big enough for you to do routine exercise not just a dip. The staffs are friendly.

I had my honeymoon here and it was a nice experience, they also provide honeymoon package with free spa for two persons, one time free lunch and a romantic dinner. They also welcomed my and my spouse with a chocolate cake the moment we arrived at the villa. It was a nice stay overall.
title: Nice Villa

text:
We absolutely loved our stay. Wonderful staff. Rooms and pool are amazing. Biggest i have seen by far for a 1 bedroom in bali. Only downside was we had room service one night and food was very forgetable. But yet breakfast and lunch were great so may have been a one off. 

Great location...less that 10mins to walk to main part of seminyak we will def be back.
title: Beautiful and spacious villas...best in bali

text:
Stayed here for 5 nights on the last leg of our honeymoon. This place is amazing! The setting is absolutely beautiful and really conveniently placed, walking distance from Seminyak village, good shops, restaurants and the beach and a cheap taxi to Kerobokan for more great restaurants. 

The pool is huge! You can actually swim laps in it. 

On arrival they filled the bath with petals and had a 'happy honeymoon' cake for us, very cute! 

I highly recommend this place if you are looking for somewhere to celebrate something special, it is very romantic.
title: Beautiful

text: We had the most amazing stay a Ziva a Boutique Villa. The villa was beautiful and very clean. The pool in the One Bedroom Pool Villa is huge compared to other villas in the area. The staff are very friendly and professional. The villa is only a 5 minute walk to Eat Street but is also very quiet. Can't wait to come back! Thanks Ziva!!
title: Immaculate villa in the heart of Seminyak

text:
What a wonderful place to stay.  Walking distance of shops and restaurants in Seminyak.  Great staff that cooked our breakfast every morning.

We had a 3 bedroom villa, which was superb.  Plenty of room, fabulous pool and was just so relaxing.

Great place for families and friends to stay.
title: Ziva a Boutique Villa

text:
I LOVE Ziva a Boutique villas. This is one of those places which is completely modern and fresh, but still inviting and serene! It starts with the lovely entrance up the main stairs with the great Balinese pond and statues and then the staff who greet you with big smiles for your check-in. You walk down the cooling and green outdoor path and then pop through your wooden door and there you have it – your holiday oasis!

The main feature is the simply huge crystal clear pool (that comes right to your bedroom wall-to-floor glass entrances mind you, just right for jumping in straight as you get out of bed!) and the funky lowered outdoor kitchen and dining area. Romantic for doing dinner outside! Large new bathroom and toilet (just hidden behind by a glass wall), and comfortable open-plan room with comfy bed and lounge. AND super-fast internet if you need! You can relax in the afternoon and read a book on the sunbeds tanning, then put on the pumping stereo and listen to some music while having a drink before heading out down the road to where the action is! So it’s got the best of both worlds.

Staff are super-professional, and place is super-clean. This is the spot to come for a Bali holiday break! I’ll be back.
title: My favourite villa in all of Bali! Exceptional.

text: My partner and I stayed at Ziva Villa's number 3, for 5 nights, as I had organised it as a surprise holiday for his birthday. Everything from the planning of the trip, to the arrival at the airport for our airport pick up, to us entering the room, the room service, the in room massage, the hose keeping, the breakfast every day, the staff and to the day that we left and were taken to the airport as another part of our airport transfers, was amazing and extremely professional. The villa is situated only a 3min walk from the main strip in Seminyak, for all your shopping and restaurants. The villa is so beautiful and well set out and the pool is HUGE. Perfect amount of sun, with the sun beds and deck situated in the perfect spot for relaxing in the sun from around 9am-1pm. The staff were lovely and so helpful. I would highly recommend this villa to a couple that is interested in a nice relaxing getaway or a couple that is on their Honeymoon. We will definitely be back soon, Thank You ZIva Villas, of our amazing getaway.
title: Jade
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Tucked in not too far from the bustle of Seminyak Square, our villa was an oasis from the chaos. Once in our villa, the sounds of the rest of humanity were a dim memory. 
The villa included a private 13m infinity edge pool, separate stone bath (a good soak was a great way to greet the dawn), with separate dining room/kitchen, and a large open bedroom with separate couch area.
The staff were very friendly, and made good breakfasts which they came and cooked in our kitchen.
The Wi-Fi was on the blink, but they supplied us with 4G dongles instead.
The bedroom had two aircons, but there were no ceiling fans either inside, or in the dining area. I miss ceiling fans as I'm not a big fan of sleeping with the aircon on all night.
Given the proximity to Seminyak, the peace and quiet, good space and friendly staff, I would happily stay here again.
title: An oasis of relaxation

text:
Extremely disappointed!!! 
On booking we had requested airport pickup, when confirmation was sent there for no info about pickup so sent another email just asking to confirm. Heard nothing back for months! Still nothing and we were due to fly out in 5 days so sent another... Didn't hear back until the moment before we boarded the plane. Arrived only to be told there wifi wasn't working... (So we couldn't transfer money or let loved ones know we arrived safe) but we looked past that and asked when it will be fixed... They said they weren't sure. Extremely inconvenient but not much we could do! Next day asked again and they still said they didn't know (couldn't even tell us what was wrong as different staff members told us different answers) Staff had no idea what was going on and heard them laughing about us being angry over no wifi after leaving reception. On the 3rd night Ran into other guests at reception and asked if they had internet they said they had complained a lot and staff brought a portable wifi to their villa. When we asked staff about this they said they had the only one so we can't get one either!!!!! We paid so much money to stay there! On our final day aircon was leaking noticed mould and peeling paint everywhere also stained bed linen. we asked a car to be organised to take us to the boats for Gili to our next hotel, they said we had missed it. After saying for 4 days we will be going there no one told us we needed to book the day before! With no wifi we couldn't even google it. The hotel phones don't let you call anywhere but reception so had to use our phone to call our next hotel and see if there was anyway to get there in time as staff at ziva had no idea. They told us we need to book a flight online, with no internet that was difficult so went to reception to see if they could help but they told us they couldn't!!!!! Immediately checked out and straight into another hotel that sorted it all out for us with a smile. Not a 5 star Hotel and extremely disappointed with our stay especially for the price we paid. Lots of cheaper hotels with better facilities and service.
title: Paid 5 star price for 1 star stay.

text: Definitely recommend this villa as the room is huge and clean. Pool is spacious, service was excellent and staff were very friendly. It was our honeymoon trip to Bali and the setup was very sweet and simple. Will definitely come again for our next visit.
title: Fabulous!
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Positives
1) good location, close to good eateries like sisterfields, bossman burgers, coco supermarket and seminyak square.
2) amazing pool, definitely one of the biggest pool villa i have stayed in seminyak, it should be slighty shorter than 10metres. 
3) good and friendly staff which dont really bother you. 
4) prompt to fix problems; one of our aircons wasnt working and a technician came to fix it immediately. 
5) decently size villa .
6) decent breakfast in villa

Cons
1) transfer from airport cost $25usd before tax. Thats more than twice the airport taxi rate. 
2) bathroom is outdoor. And it really isnt romantic. Imagine taking a dump in the hot humid environment with mosquitoes flying around and no door. 
3) villa deck wooden planks look abit dated. Might be abit dangerous with splinters and also the landscape of the place is such that there is no way to walk to the deck area via the bathroom. 
4) only one stair entrance to the pool via the bathroom. Or you can climb out of the pool via the deck if you are strong enough.  
5) housekeeping not very consistent. Sometimes we are missing a spoon, missing a cup, missing a plate.. Etc etc. We also had to pay 35000idr for breaking a glass cup .. Hmmmm
title: Ok, can be better

text: Best holiday ever ,truly a magnificent experience & this is from a experienced traveller .From the moment you walk down the canopy walkway to your villa it just gets better & better ,your door opens to a fully private wonderland ,where else can you dive from your bed into the pool,amazing.Layout of villa perfect ,sun all day by the pool ,bed very comfy,proximity to everything Seminyak has to offer ,walking distance too. Last but not least staff were delightful & more then accommodating,i will be returning to this magnificent villa & highly recommend the Ziva Villas to anyone wanting the perfect holiday
title: A amazing experience

text: Loved everything about the villa.. The breakfast was really good.. Although the villa was abit deep in but the access to taxi is easy once u step out of the villa.. Theres a mart outside.. Everything is good except for the cleanliness of the bathroom upon arriving need to be taken care of.. Overall loved everything about it and would definitely return to this beautiful place.. Memorable experience
title: Perfect for honeymoon
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Love this villa! So comfortable, clean, and cozy. Amazing pool, large enough for us to do laps for morning exercises. You can access the pool from the room as well. The room is covered by glass doors all over. The bathtub is huge, but it is outdoor in open space located by the pool. As well as the bathroom and toilet (but more private as it is somewhat covered with walls). Ehm! It might be less comfortable for some people. Cause it was odd for us too. Some access in the villa is just not as friendly such as the access to the kitchen that has a very steep step, which could be problematic if you have leg/foot problem. The steps to get onto the pool are also very steep. Service was great, they always call first before hitting the bell to our villa. Breakfast are cooked in your kitchen, you can watch as they prepare it. We took the honeymoon package, and I can tell you they are very generous with the flowers! Our first night, the tub was filled with flowers. Flowers and swans were also on the bed. Spa session ended with hot tub covered with flowers. Dinner was surrounded by flowers upon flowers. I feel kinda bad for the staff cleaning the flowers afterwards. Food was okay, there's room for improvement. Overall, this place is so great for honeymoon or couples getaways. I wouldn't mind coming back here at all!!
title: A wonderful stay!

text: This place is truly amazing. From the time we checked in till the time we checked out, we were taken care so well by the staffs & gm, Mr. Hendrawan. We had purchased the package a few months back by a local fair and he personally attended to us and eventually we signed up for ziva villas in seminyak. He had kept up to his word and for everything single thing that he had promised, he delivered. We had no doubts & qualms about anything at all. Breakfast was prepared in our room by the pool, lunch, was served to the room, a romantic candlelight dinner was served to our room, and on the morning of my brithday, he & all his staff came to our room with a cake singing happy birthday. The service was so personalized and truly spectacular. I would definitely come back here again and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a villa in seminyak.
title: Honeymoon Package

text:
We stayed for 3 day 2 night and we bought the honeymoon packages, location of villa its great!! Just a minutes from kayu aya seminyak, the pool was awesome, its a big and you can jump from your room or living room.
The food was ok, but the they bring chef and buttler to serve our breakfast.

Just make sure your door close and your electric mosquito coils & air con in on position  or mosquito will come to your room.

Overall, ziva villa was great place for honeymooners!! And we will definitely come back here

Thak u ziva!!
title: Honeymoon

text: great private villa with  friendly and welcoming staff!!. our room was clean twice a day and they even sprayed mosquito spray before we got back after a day out! Love being able to get out of bed and go straight  into the pool !! breakfast was lovely! best part of all the location location location :)
title: such a great place to get away  and relax

Ziva definitely has that wow factor as you enter!! Such a huge pool and beautiful decor! Loved having the privacy and breaky cooked daily for us. Food could have been slightly better and make sure you do not get them to order you a taxi anywhere  its a minimum of 30,000 even if you are going around the corner and it only cost us 50,000 to go to Kuta for the day!
Lovely staff and would definitely go back
title: Beautiful Villa

text: It is an excellent Villa with private swimming pool and excellent service. Breakfast is cooked to serve in your kitchen. The room is spacious. The only bad thing is mosquitoes when leave the doors open. Other than that everything is excellent.
title: Excellent Villa in seminyak
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: The villas are located in a great spot. The gardens are beautiful and the pool is a really great size. Privacy is fantastic. Breakfast is great although we noticed that after the first day, our juices were watered down until the final day, they were back to the full 100% juice. We loved the villa overall but for the price per night, the furniture should be updated, especially when there is stained cup "rings" on the tables and the carpets are completely stained and old. We were also disappointed with the toiletries supplied, the bath and shower gel were unusable due to an off, foul odour. So we just bought our own. Not a big deal, but again, for the price per night, we didn't expect to find this.
title: Great location
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: If you are looking for a relaxing and private stay then Ziva is a great choice! We spent alot of time reading/ snoozing by the pool undisturbed during the day before venturing out to the many excellent restaurants nearby. Breakfast was ok, cooked to order within the villa but we enjoyed having breakfast a short walk away to Sisterfields or Corner House where the coffee is excellent. Air con worked well, pool cleaned daily, staff were lovely and accommodating. Sprayed the villa and gardens for mosquitos whilst there. Private and quiet..Location is excellent - short walk to Eat St and easy to grab a taxi to Petitenget/ Batu Belig. As regular visitors to Seminyak we can highly recommend and have rebooked our next stay. Do try the new Chinese resaturant across the road - Happy Chappy -Dim Sum on Sundays! Oh and the shortcut to Eat St comes out at Red Carpet Champagne Bar or the other way leads to Ultimo on Eat St...
title: Wonderful private stay

text: We were greeted with a very warm welcome from the receptionist , the room was a honeymoon setup so a welcome juice and wet towel were provided. Very nice place . only the food is not up to expectation.

text: We went there last august for honeymoon and we were pleased to stay there. The villa looks nice, the room's clean, the swimming pool 's clean, the staffs very friendly and helpful, internet connection was good too. However, we found cockroach inside the bathroom on the first day. It can be tolerated as the bathroom is kind of outdoor. partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

Only minor things got to improve is the supply of mineral water is too strict as they only supply 2 small bottles of mineral water despite requesting for it. The plus point of the room service and breakfast is its serve hot rather than some is pre prepared and cold while served. The pool size is good enough for me and my partner also its consider quite well kept. Overall its a pleasant stay there with the feel of warmth from the staff.

- Air conditioning didn't work for 2 nights. Water dripped down onto dresser and soaked it wet 
- No WiFi on last day of stay 
- Wanted to order room service for dinner but was told that I'd have to wait as it was dinner time at one of the other villas they serve 
- Shower head came apart in the middle of shower
- Food was only so so. Opted not to eat breakfast in by the third day even though it was complimentary 
- the standard small Shower gel jar you find in hotels was slimy on the outside and I accidentally dropped. Made to pay around US 12 dollars when it probably cost the villa like 50cents. 
- location is a 15 min walk to and from Seminyak central 
- general areas were dirty. Housekeeping left my clean clothes on the dirty floor carpet. Must have forgotten to place it on the bed instead 

Dated villa with its glory days well behind it. I wouldn't be staying here again.
title: Think Twice

text:
Stayed in a 3 BR villa with friends.   The grounds of the villa are big, beautiful, with a large sized pool. I loved the pool and garden...i could spend the whole day there.

Villa was clean, with lots of clean towels. the Villa, gardens and pool were cleaned everyday.  Location is good - its 15 minutes walk to the beach.  

Service was patchy - could be excellent, or just so-so.   We didn't get our tea on one of the days.

The interior of the villas are starting to show some wear and tear, some refurbishment should be done soon before it starts to look tired.   Having said that I would stay here again if i were return to Seminyak
title: A place to get away from it all
