text:
I loved this villa! Very cosy, location fantastic and the pool is perfection- big, clean and perfect water temperature! 

The villa was cleaned well but my only complaints would be that the villa needs maintenance work. We stayed in villa 2 and the tap in the sink was lose, the wooden floors around the pool were old and flimsy and close to breaking, which can be dangerous. The remote control for the tv's were quite old and the numbers couldn't be seen properly. 

Other then those complaints I would still have no hesitation in recommending. It is exactly what you want and need when visiting Bali! It has a great feel to it and is private, quite and has everything you need. Service is great but breakfast is average especially when compared with all the amazing breakfast places in seminyak. Sisterfields is a 2min walk- amazing breaky!

You won't regret staying here- so book it in and give it a go!
title: Definitely coming back!

text: My husband and I stayed for 7 nights in a one bedroom villa for part of our honeymoon at the start of May 2015. We loved every bit about Ziva, the location was within walking distance to many restaurants and shops though we decided to hire a scooter to get around as we have done in Bali before. The staff were excellent at check-in and throughout our stay. They even helped us order a pizza delivery late one night. The entire villa was made up each day including the gardens and pool - everything was always spotless and clean. The cooked breakfast each morning was very handy and always delicious. First impressions were incredible with rose petals in the bath and towel + flower set up on our bed - it was just what we were wanting for our honeymoon in Bali.
title: Perfect villa for our honeymoon

text: Just returned from 5 wonderful days at the Ziva Boutique Villas.  Loved every moment of it and will definately return again to Ziva.  The staff were so friendly and helpful ( a special thank you to Julie at Reception).  The villa's are in the perfect spot with easy access to everything in Seminyak.  Next door there is a spa, which is also great and very handy.  Cant thank you enough for a beauitful stay in Bali.
title: Perfection

text:
Not very catchy on a first sight but you'll be amazed with the interior and awesome service every staffs rendered. Simply efficient, affordable rates, cleanliness is well maintained, walking distance to Seminyak Square and money changers. My birthday bash staycation  has been a memorable one. Thanks Ms Komang Inten!
Thumbs up!
title: One of the best Villa I ever stayed!

text: Loved the convenience of Ziva villa, although sort of within the alley roads, its only a few minutes away from the beach, restaurant & bars, and shopping streets. You still get your privacy with no noise and enjoy your private pool (decent size). In the morning you get your breakfast of your choice delivered to your room or have them cooked that morning. Thank you for your service/hospitality..I shall return to Bali.
title: Private, Clean, Convenient stay

text:
We have your own villa and pool.
Great service.close to town and I really enjoyed my stay.
Unluckily I could book make it there on my second stay in Bali since they were fully booked so tried one of those famous chains, great location but service not the same at all. 
I will definitely stay there again.
title: Just great

text:
We had a fantastic experience at villa 3, 3 couples and a baby for 10 days. Firstly the staff were wonderful, professional, courteous,accomadating and above all so friendly they made the stay more special and we feel like we made new friends.
the accommodation is lovely and spacious and very clean, the breakfast was beautifully prepared and plentiful.
the staff are always on hand if you need anything but not intrusive. I would highly recommend Ziva especially if you have children as chi chi and her team adored our niece and she received lots of cuddles and flowers. If we return to seminyak we would definitely return to ziva.
title: luxury villa stay

text:
These Villas are superb and the service is excellent.  We stayed in Nov and had an amazing time so much so we are heading back in June. 

Staff are very attentive and nothing was too much trouble! After 7 visits to Bali this on my 5 star list due to the design and the service. Clean and luxury!
title: Absolute bliss

text:
We stayed at the 1br villa and it's really designed for couples more than friends... Nonetheless we still loved the villa.

Breakfast options has increased to 4 main meal options (Western, Asian, Veg, Jap) which makes breakfast seem more interesting. 

Room service food isn't the best in Bali sadly. Satay was not nice, but sauce was. Nasi goreng was dry and too peppery. Prices are the highest I've seen in Bali. This villa charges over 21% taxes which is not seen in any restaurants I've been to. Most are 15-16% taxes only.

Staffs are nice and friendly. 

Cons: I love the villa and the size of the pool was great. However, I would suggest housekeeping should clean the pool (from leaves) when possible. I stayed for 5 days and it was never cleaned. 
Pool night light was switched on only when they remembered. When off its a bit dark to see where you're swimming.

They should consider putting an outdoor master switch somewhere inside the villa compound. We had to sleep with the villa garden lights on ... Sound silly but if you're light sensitive then you might struggle sleeping as its well lit garden is just outside the windows.

We didn't have any insect problem as they spray every second day from what I was told.

Location - this was the biggest win for us. It was far enough away from the noisy main streets yet near enough for us to walk to everyday. 
My friend and I love walking so decided against hiring a bike. 

Tip - there's a good laundry shop (Widi laundry) which is 5mins walk max. They charge by pieces but iron and all our clothes were in good condition :)
It's near K Villa and Seminyak Residence. 

Overall, we like this villa as its very small which makes it a nice quiet place to just chill out.

Yes, I would recommend staying here for those not big on partying and doesn't mind paying premium price for F&B in room.
title: Nice and central

photos.caption:
Asian breakfast:
Nasi goreng (L) Mee goreng (R)

text:
Had goen there with my husband for our first anniversary. After literally researching for a month ,i narrowed down on Ziva villas and im so so happy that we did it. 
Everything about this place is just blissful.. What you see on the website is exactly what we got.
Had booked through cantikbillas and there had been some error with the booking dates which i realised just a day before flying and oyu cannot imagine how panicked i was but Komang- the manager at ziva helped me a lot and must stay the staff here just makes ur stay all the more pleasant. They genuinely care and ensure that you enjoy ur stay.

Villa- we stayed in one bedroom villa and the pool is the biggest that you will find anywhere in bali. 
all the facilities are amazing and contrary to what we heard, we didnt face any problems with mosquitoes or insects.. 
Staff - always with a smile.. brings a genuine smile on ur face too. Welcomed us with fresh juices and an anniversary cake. They had made a beautiful rose petal bath tub ready for us..
location - very close to all the action. we hired a bike from the front desk and moved arond easily.. kudeta , ultimo ,Earth cafe , potato head all are within 2-5minutes distance.
Food - we just had breakfast here and it was amazing since we are vegetarians.

If you visiting bali then a stay at Ziva is a must. im going to ask all my friends n family to stay here only.
Just a regret - wish we stayed more than 2nights..
thanks -kOMANG, AGUNG AND ALL AT ZIVA :)
title: Serene..mesmerised..One of the most romantic stay :)

text:
We stayed for 3 nights in February with a Groupon voucher in Villa no. 3.

Prior to arrival, I kept in regular contact with hotel staff to arrange for our airport transfer and to top up US$60 per night for my son to stay with us. Emails were very promptly replied to, within a day or so. 

Upon arrival, we were picked up at the airport as arranged in a private car and offered cold drinks on the 20 minute drive back to the villa. Very thoughtful gesture. Very polite driver. 

The extra bed we paid for was a large double sofa bed with a thick firm mattress, very neatly laid out in the large room. In addition to this we had a king-size bed. Room was large and VERY spacious for 3 people. Everything was new and clean. 

Toilet and shower were outside the room in an outdoor area. There are no doors to toilet or shower so may not be suitable for people not travelling with family/ close friends. 

The pool was the main attraction of the villa. It was at least 12m with 2 deck chairs, which I used to sunbathe daily. We had a couple of swims daily in the pool, and they also provided floats for my son. 

Breakfast was cooked to order in our own kitchen area by friendly staff at a time we chose. Food was good and plentiful. There was enough to eat for lunch. Our package included "afternoon tea" - which was essentially 2 bite size cakes with a cup of coffee, anytime you wanted between 4pm and 6pm. 

Service was generally good. Rooms were properly cleaned daily and turned down at night. No problems with mosquitoes as they fog every other day. Privacy respected as staff will telephone or ring the doorbell before they enter the villa. 

There was a power cut at 3am on our last night. Rang reception and was told engineer will only come at 9am. It was stifling hot and stuffy so we had to open all the windows. Thankfully at this point it began to rain heavily so we managed to drift back to sleep, and the power and air-con came back on at around 8am. 

The air-con units did struggle to keep the large room cool on very hot days. Perhaps this is something that the management can look into improving. 

Location wise it is 5 minutes away from the main stretch in Seminyak where there are plenty of dining options and interesting shops to browse. A mini-mart was right opposite the hotel where we bought drinks. We walked to Seminyak Beach - took around 15 minutes. 

We had a wonderful time, especially my 4 year old son, and we would definitely recommend this place because of the wonderful location, large pool, luxurious surroundings and awesome service. Great value!!
title: Luxurious villa with large pool!

text:
My wife and I have just returned from spending 7 nights at Ziva Villas. From the moment we met our butler at the airport to transfer to the Villa the service commenced. His attention and friendly smile and way, was outstanding. We talk on the way from the airport and he provided a great introduction and understanding of the local ways.
On arrival at Ziva we were again greeted with warmly from the security staff then the reception staff. After a very quick check in we were shown to our villa (villa 1), both my wife and I were blown away with what waited for us behind the doors to the villa compound, the pool looked perfect and walking into the room was amazing. The bed was presented with rose shaped hart and a swan made from folded towels on the bed was great, the bath outside again covered in flowers and hart shaped.
Our butler then presented us with a welcome cocktail and present a hart shaped chocolate cake with the writing “Happy 20Th Wedding Anniversary”, this was a great gesture and a wonderful thought.
Our visit to Ziva was perfect, we never wanted for anything and if we asked it was supplied quickly and happily. 
The breakfast cooked in our villa was fantastic and to our liking, the cooking class with chef for lunch was great, enjoyable and delouses.
In all I could not fault the Ziva Villas, the staff and property were fantastic and I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a first class experience and stay then do not bother looking just book Ziva, you will not be disappointed.
As this was our first trip to Bali, Ziva has made this memorable and enjoyable and we will return again, thank you all the staff you should be very proud of the property and service you provide.
title: Outstanding, Best Experance we have had in a villa

text: Absolutely beautiful villas with amazing service, all the staff were so friendly and always greeted you with a lovely genuine smile - they arranged a cake for my boyfriends birthday and came in singing for him which was just such a beautiful sentiment. Our biggest regret was only staying there for two nights. Will definitely be back :)
title: Amazing!

text:
We stayed here for two nights. The hotel itself is relatively new and modern. The location of the hotel is just a 10 minutes walk from the busy seminyak road.

We stayed in a one bedroom villa. Compare to our other villa experience in Bali, the pool at Ziva is by far the largest that we had so far. The villa had separate kitchen and dinning area, bedroom area, and bathroom area. We loved our outdoor shower and outdoor bathtub. And because of that, this villa maybe more suitable to couples. 

The service was great, the staff were very friendly and the ambiance of the place is wonderful. Will definitely return here.
title: Great villa

text:
We stayed at Ziva Residence (3 bedroom villa) for 2 nights. The villa is amazing in term of design and facility. However we had some unexpected experience on the first night. One of our friend dislocate her ankle when she step down on the living room at master bedroom. She’s not expecting the mattress is very soft and there’s uneven level between the floor and the mattress. Therefore she fell down on the mattress and her ankle dislocate. 

The experience is not stop there. At around 11pm, we experience the power failure at the villa. The power failure is taking place 4 times and each failure is happening in 15 minutes period each of them. Honestly this incident is very uncomfortable for us because we were sitting in the living room and listening the music and when the power failure happen, we need to set all of them from the beginning again. 

Not only that, one of our friend is taking shower when the power failure is happening and she experience some incident where she hit into the bathroom door when she’s trying to go out from the bathroom in total darkness. Because of that, there’s a big scar on her forehead. We called the front office to inform the situation and they said that the power is overload and we need to limit the usage of the electricity. Which is not making any sense because we’ve been using the same electricity from the afternoon and have no problem. We asked the manager to come to explain the situation, but the manager is not in the villa because it’s already midnight. Therefore we asked them to inform the manager to stop by at our villa the next morning. 
The manager did come the next morning and explaining the situation and apologies for the incident. He also mentioning that the employee will try to fix the problem on the day so the incident won’t happen again at night. 

We also experience another incident where there are some frogs coming to the bathroom at night because the mater bathroom is open air and have open access from outside and the garden itself. Therefore the frogs are coming from the garden into the bathtub and stays there for the whole night. 

Another issue is we order the breakfast for the last day. We order the menu from the night before. However, the person didn’t mentioning if there’s additional charge if we’d like to order more than we entitle for the persons. We notice after we have our breakfast, we need to sign the additional charges for extra meal that we order. It’s not the nominal that we need to pay, but they suppose to explain regarding the charges when we order the night before. Even though we asked, but they didn’t say anything. 

The villa design is amazing in term of the facility and the layout. However because of the garden design, they need to do something in order to prevent the animals coming into the room. Also there are many mosquito in the living room and the room itself. When we open the drawer, they’re full of dust. It feels like the villa is haven’t been rent for some period, or the housekeeping is not doing their job as suppose to. 

Once again, the villa is good in term of design and facility, but they need to pay more attention into their cleanliness and to have their people do their job as supposed to. And the holiday that suppose to be fun and relaxing, is totally become a worry minute by minute during the stay because we never know what we will experience from time to time during the stay.
title: amazing villa, however not a good experience during stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Darmawan,

Firstly Behalf of Management that we do appologized that happened during you have stayed at Ziva a Residence. We have explaining about the technical happend on the that day by electricity happen and everything that already fix it up. 

Every comment, suggestion and advised highly appreciated we will received and follow up by term of our carellyness and responsibility to be upgrade of our product.

And also we are pleased to informing you that Ziva has 2 review page Ziva Villas and Ziva Residence has own review page follow the separated area between of Them.

We are pleased to welcoming you again at Ziva a Residence behind of Oberoi Hotel or Ziva a Boutique Villa at Jl. Beraban No 65 Seminyak Kuta Bali.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Was there as I need a break from work.

Place is wonderful. 5 minutes from the main road and yet you won't hear it.

Service is top notch and attentive, from the airport pick up to back at the villa where they fixed the aircon for me when it got hot.

Villa itself is rather well maintained, although it does feel a little smaller than what the pictures show. Furniture and design is wonderful, however, practicality suffers in some areas - safety box was in the outdoor area, there is a table inside the room that really doesn't serve any purpose since there are no chairs and I ended up using it for my clothes.... because the wardrobe was outside as well.

Food wise, the breakfast are pretty good. My favourites are the eggs ben, mee and nasi goreng. However, it can be rather hit of miss sometimes and the chef seems to be different everyday, so even ordering the same thing for room service might give you different standards and presentation on a day to day basis. Tried almost everything on the room service menu and the calamari is good most days.

All in all, a really good deal for the groupon that I bought which averages out to about $265SGD/night. I might have been more demanding at the regular rate of $350/night.

Would definitely recommend :)
title: A Spot of Serenity

text: I stayed in this villa this january with some of my friends, I booked the 3bedrooms villa , and they villa was great, new design , clean and minimalist style , i love the swimming pool and the master bedroom, very great to chill out with friends here, we spent so many times in the pool w/ glass of wine/champagne hahha , anyway, actually overall was a great villa, and the service was great, staffs was very friendly, the only problem was I think they dont have enough staffs, and sometimes 1 staff can do so many things, so most of the times when we need something, it takes a lil bit longer than It should be ... Check some of my pictures of the villa ...
title: Love our 3 bedroom villa !!!

photos.caption: Enjoying our sunset in the swimming pool

text:
Nice and amazing villa we r stay at 2 nights ....  we will plan to stay more on next time.  Good and lovely staff always to helpful us . 

Wonderful design of villa for us to vacation . It' s locate on seminyak and convenience went to anyways . Furthermore ,its be quiet environment to rest and relaxing .
title: Wonderful and amazing villa

text:
We stayed in Ziva for 2 nights and wished we stayed for more! the staff were very friendly even before our arrival, and were quite helpful too. Our villa was booked through a groupon promotion and it was money well spent - 5 star service and facilities for a great price.

We were quite nervous about the hotel not being as advertised in the pictures but when we arrived it was actually so much more beautiful and impressive. The pool in our villa was large and the whole villa was very spacious. The furnishings and finishings were tastefully selected to give a clean mod-70's feel - not at all dated but instead classic and timeless. The open concept bathroom was interesting and refreshing - open but private at the same time. The breakfast and lunch included in our deal was delicious - prepared right in our villa by a chef. 

On arrival we were informed that the villa next to ours was under renovation and they apologised for any discomfort we might face, but we did not experience any noise or dust at all. Would definitely recommend Ziva and look forward to staying here again!
title: Amazing Villa and wonderful staff

photos.caption: Kitchenette and dining area from room across pool
Pool and room from kitchenette/dining area

text:
Ziva villa's is a complete gem. I would rate ziva 10/10 everything you will read about the reviews are true.  The pool was our highlight yes it is huge the photo's are true if not better in real life. 
Inside also just beautiful our favorite, have not a bad word to say. The staff are all so beautiful as well always willing to help you and make you feel at home. ( Thank you Julie )
Yes we will be back.
Can I suggest to the Ozie traveller pay in Indonesian dollars to save on the taxes. only advice. 
Yes breakfast suggest the Omelette can recommend 
Debra & Greg Wild
title: HIDDEN GEM

text: We stayed for 3 nights in a one bedroom pool villa. It felt really modern and tranquil, and the service was excellent - whenever we requested food or help with anything the staff were very helpful and attentive. The pool itself was a nice refreshing respite from the heat and humidity, and the daily cooked breakfasts were delicious. We would definitely return if we were to make another trip to Bali.
title: Peaceful and Relaxing
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: We had a best stay in this villa and will definitely will visit whenever we have the time. Simply feel like being at home. Enjoyed our stay, people were friendly, I will definitely recommend to my family and friends.
title: Beautiful Villa and Friendly People
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Being very close to the centre of Seminyak was a huge attraction of this property when booking. However, when we arrived, to our surprise the property matched the photos on the Internet. We stayed for 1 week in this spacious, air conditioned, floor to ceiling windowed with huge lap pool villa. Staff cooked breakfast to our specification every morning in the outdoor, poolside kitchen and were very friendly and attentive. Bathroom facilities are outside which are nice but can be a little hot/humid when trying to keep dry when getting ready to go out.
title: Tranquil space

text: We stayed in villa 3 for 7 nights with a great Scoopon deal.  The villas are very modern, clean and a wonderful way to relax.  The 15m pool was clean and at a great temperature.  Having breakfast cooked every morning was a novelty with my only comment being that a greater range in breakfast options would be useful.  The staff and service were amazing with nothing to hard.  The villas are an easy 5 minute walk to the main street and approx 15 minute to the beach.  Fantastic stay and would recommend.
title: Gorgeous

text: We stayed in Villa 1 for one week. The villa was something you'd see on a postcard or magazine. It was the perfect escape for our honeymoon. Having our own private pool to dip into any time of day was a luxury. The room itself was amazing. Floor to Ceiling windows for a panoramic view of your villa. Outdoor modern bathroom. Huge shower, The staff were so helpful and welcoming. And the breakfast prepared and cooked for us every morning in our villa just topped off the whole experience. Will keep dreaming of this place as we return to reality. It is our favourite escape by far!
title: Bliss

text:
This review is for Villa Number 1 – Elora.

From the moment we walked through the beautiful doors of our villa we were just in awe of its beauty, we could not believe how stunning this villa was, the villa has been designed around the most beautiful swimming 12 meter pool with floor to ceiling glass so you can view the pool and outside garden from anywhere in the villa.  The outdoor bathroom and toilet was such a nice change to what I am used to, yes there are mozzies, it’s the tropic’s, but they give you repelant and insect spray to use if you need to use it, and the villa is fumigated inside and out every 2 days.. I don’t think I got bitten once so I had no issue at all.

The breakfast served daily was lovely, a choice of breakfast was offered the night before and the cook will come and prepare your breakfast at your outdoor kitchen and serve you.

The service at this villa was outstanding, staff were always smiling and making sure we were okay and if we needed any advice or help with where we were going each day, they would have done anything for us, I have not seen service like this for a long time.

I would highly recommend anyone considering a villa to stay here, its only a few minutes walk to the main road Jalan Laksmana which is where lots of the popular restaurants & boutiques are located and the beach is approx. 10-15 minutes walk which can be a difficult walk when the weather is so hot, so we opted for a hire scooter which made everything so easy.

The spa right next door Chiara, is average, don’t recommend going there, maybe okay for a foot massage only. Overall, loved every moment of this villa and will be back!
title: Amazing in Every Way !

text: This one bedroom pool villa in Seminyak exceeded our expectations! The comfort of the bed, layout of the room and the private courtyard with a pool was just amazing. The prices of the food in room service were great, and the service quality was also excellent! It was truly a perfect start to our honeymoon.
title: A perfect start to our honeymoon

text:
Booked here using a Scoopon! Amazing stay, great staff, rooms clean, fantastic cooked breakfast, location outstanding! Staff were very friendly were always there to help if required. Our room wasn't ready the first night we were they, they happily up graded us for the night until our room was ready.
Highly recommend the stay here!
title: Outstanding

text:
Recently we stayed at the Ziva Boutique Villa with my family, we stayed in the 3 Bedroom Pool Villa. 
The villa is 5 minutes away from the Oberoi Street in Seminyak. You don't need any transport for shopping & dining. The Villa inside is well decorated, full of spaciousness with a excellent swimming pool. Breakfast is served by the butler in the villa. Outside of the Villa is the 24 hours Minimart which makes it so convenient.   
The rooms are very clean and well maintain, staff is very friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend this villa should you be looking for a quite & cozy.
title: " Excellent "

text: Villa was perfect for our family vacation with our 2-year-old son. He loved the pool which was even big enough for laps. The room was very comfortable. Self-contained villa which offered privacy and a break away from the hustle and bustle. Staff were wonderful. Property was however showing some signs of wear and tear. Nonetheless, a great place for a memorable stay.
title: Memorable stay with family

text: Excellent service, the villa is so amazing would definitely recommend and stay there again!! Location is great and having a private villa is even better. The pool is amazing. Staff are really friendly and having your own private chef of a morning to cook you breaky is amazing. Would highly recommend this villa to anyone.
title: Most amazing place to stay!

text: Recently stayed at this hotel and quality was below average. Its only a few years old but the property is not well maintained and I wouldn't stay here again. The layout of the villa and concept is fine but the timber decks around the pool were rotten and collapsing in parts; the walls of the garden were mouldy and unpainted; the floors were stained; curtains were dirty and blood stained; rug on the floor looked flithy and overall room was just shabby.
title: Below Expectations

owner_response.text:

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My sister and I arrived at Ziva after spending 4 days in Ubud. We were pleasantly surprised. It was our little sanctuary away from the hustle & bustle of Seminyak. The villas are modern and clean with just enough planting to make you feel like your in a little oasis. Loved the furniture and the linen-if only I had a container, I'd buy the lot. The breakfast is fantastic (particularly the French toast!) and is just enough to keep you going through to the afternoon. Location is great - 2min walk and your in the middle of Seminyak. Staff are wonderful, couldn't fault them on anything. On all levels Ziva exceeded our expectations, we wouldn't hesitate to recommend to anyone
title: Location, rooms, staff, service - SUPERB

text: Ziva are very modern Villas - large and comfortable. It rained quite a bit when we stayed and we could open up the windows and enjoy the rain. The villas are very private and you are left on your own until you call for service which is impeccable. It may have seemed a little sterile for Bali but we had a great stay. I also found a very good masseuse next door in a 'boutique' for 55000RP per hour. One thing I will recommend is to get a taxi to and from at night. We had a couple of uncomfortable experiences on some of the back streets at night whilst walking back to the Villa.
title: Excellent villa

text: I have stayed here back in march with my partner for our anniversary.  It was both our first time heading to bali and I must say it has been a delight vacation. The staff at ziva has made our stay just perfect. Always willing to assist us with getting around bali, tourists and restaurants.  Even when it was late at night and the kitchen was closed, they still managed to fill our tummies since we were starving on the first night we got there. So thats when we knew this villa was going to work out for us. The location was excellent since it was only 5 mins away from the main streets. The photos on the website are exactly what your gonna expect.  Both my partner and I was worried before we got there about the mozzies that were going to eat us alive, but to our surprised we didnt get bitten once. Thanks to the staffs for organizing the incense and spray for us before we got there. The pool is very large that you can do laps. The breakfast was decent but you cant ask for much when its free. Overall we would love to come back when we visit bali again. Thanks for such an amazing experience. We felt like we were superstars living in such a 5star villa. Worth every penny =)
title: The best villa ive ever stayed at

text: We had a wonderful stay at ziva villas. As soon as we arrived we were collected from the airport and welcomed so warmly. The villa was truly beautiful with lush gardens and totally private. The pool was amazing!! Absolutely huge, and a fantastic place to go back to and escape the heat and busy streets of Bali. The staff were friendly and so willing and helpful. They helped us organise days out and took care of more than we ever would have expected. It was close to great eating places, an easy walk around the corner to the Main Street of seminyak. We really loved staying here. It was an absolute treat. Thank you Ziva for a magnificent holiday.
title: Beautiful retreat.
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: I would just like to write a review although i didnt get to stay at Ziva, I booked in for a 4 day stay with Ziva boutique with only 24hrs notice online & when i arrived @ Ziva unfortunately my 1 bedroom pool villa was not ready yet! I was not too dissapointed because i was just so excited to be in Bali for the first time, The Manager of the property advised me that they had been trying to contact me due to the issue but were not in any luck (I was on the plane lol) They ended up booking me into another 5 star private pool villa with all the same perks & even had me driven there by the private driver, I was so amazed by the customer service & hopefully one day will get to come back again and actually get to stay!! by the looks of it the Ziva Villas were gorgeous & very unique!! Thank you Ziva!! My stay at the other villa was just as magical and I enjoyed every minute of our stay!!
title: Excellent Customer Service

text: Stayed 4 nights in a 1 bedroom pool villa at Ziva for our honeymoon. It's in a great location, staff are lovely and the villas pool is huge! The only issue we had was the villa next door was being renovated (so was a little noisy) which we weren't told about until after we paid in full at check in. Was a little disappointed as they knew it was our honeymoon so pre advice of this would've been nice. But all in all nice villa complex.

text:
We have just had 5 nights in this villa and hated leaving. It was every thing we thought it would be and more. 

The staff were friendly, helpful and completely accommodating.

The villa itself will be hard to beat the pool was a full size pool suitable for swimming not just plunging, the decor was contemporary with everything you could want to make your stay enjoyable.

We have stayed in some fabulous villas and boutique hotels throughout Asia, Europe and America and this one is certainly up there, we will be back ad wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to anyone wanting to kick back and relax in seminyak.
title: Heaven on a stick!

text:
We have just spent 10 days here and were really happy with Ziva Villas. Both my girlfriend and I wanted a place that was clean, modern and close to the action. They're located about 10 minutes walk from the main drag (even less on a $5 a day scooter), so it's nice and close but far enough away to avoid the noise, etc. 

Pros:
- The bed was so comfy. 
- Pool is massive
- Villas design is modern but still with bali feel
- Staff were friendly and helpful 
- Well priced
- 24 hour security

Cons
- Wardrobes were not great for packing clothing away. Shelves were in odd places. 

Overall we couldn't really fault the place. And that's saying a lot, because I'm a picky son of a b****.
title: Great villas - well prices and positioned.

text:
The really positive reviews on here made me want to stay at Ziva.  I guess expectations were raised high.  There are, of course, positives and negatives to all locations so these are our impressions:

+
1. Villas are nicely designed. I believe they were built in 2010 but i think they will age fairly quickly.  The outside is built of concrete and areas around the bathroom look water stained but i guess this is a minor issue
2. Bed very comfortable and large
3. Pool very big
4. Close to restaurants and a short taxi ride to other areas of night life

-
1. Staff are nice but rather amateurish.  Example - they asked when they could send someone into check to wifi.  I said i was by the pool all afternoon so this could not be done until the evening.  However, that afternoon, some engineer was clambering over the roof of the villa destroying any notion of privacy 
2. Food well below standard.  Breakfast at $10 per head is well over-priced.  Good job so many restaurants close by
3. I was stunned when a bottle of mineral water broke in the fridge due to a rickety shelf.  The hotel charged me for the broken bottle!   Just ridiculous. 

Overall, a relaxing stay.  I spent around $2000 for 7 nights.  I think this was fairly expensive so will probably give another place a try next time i am in Bali
title: Good......but with some flaws

text: Great place for honeymooners and relaxing. Clean and nice room with private pool, pantry, living room, and open shower room. Limited option for breakfast but quite nice overall. Next to car & motorbike rental. U can go to German restaurant & bar by walking dustance for 3 minutes. Definetely will stay here again.
title: Great place for family & honeymooners.

photos.caption: shower room w/ his & hers wastafel

text:
I travel often to Bali and have stayed in many of the villas there.  I liked Ziva very much.  The modern design/glass box concept is interesting and the pool was very large.  Outdoor bathroom is spacious, if a little slippery!  Bed was very comfortable.  

A few minor downsides.  Layout is a little odd.  Kitchenette is really just for staff to prepare breakfast and to eat it there.  Outdoor seating area is not connected to the living pavilion, so it does not have that "hang around and relax at the villa" feel that some of the others have.  Effectively, there is no outdoor living area, which I think is usually one of the best things about Bali villa holidays.  

One minor staff gripe (although overall quite friendly).  Used an iron and ironing board on Saturday night before a big night out.  Got back to the villa at about 4:30 AM, only to be woken up at 07:30 AM on Sunday morning (!!!!!!!!!!!!!!) asking if staff could come and get the iron.  This, in my mind, is a MAJOR service failing.  I'm afraid I let out a string of expletives and slammed the phone down.  Not exactly graceful, but an 07:30 Sunday morning disruption by staff better be because the world is about to end, not to chase down an ironing board.
title: Very good, with a few minor issues

text:
I had reserved a 3 bedroom villa in Ziva on 20th of January through my travel agent (Joe Travel in Bogor, Indonesia).
The travel agent had also email me a booking conformation to stay from 22 April to 24 April .
On 26th of February, my agent informed me that Ziva had refused to honour my reservation.
Apparently, Ziva had recently received another booking through the internet, which had a higher rate compared to the rate from my travel agent.
Since my villa's rate per night was lower, Ziva just cancelled my reservation.
I think that it was very irresponsible of Ziva to do this.
My friends and I was really looking forward to stay in Ziva.
Please be careful when booking with Ziva villa since it might cancel your reservation whenever they can get a higher rate somewhere else.
title: Ziva refused to honour my reservation

text: We stayed at Ziva in January of this year for 6 days. The villas are central to all that is Seminyak with a 2 minute walk to the best restaurants & shopping yet in a very quiet location. The villa is huge & modern & the pool is 3 times the size of other pool villas in the area. We didn't even leave some days as once you have had breakfast cooked for you in your villa it is the perfect setting to lay by the pool & order great room service for lunch. The villas are clean & have great WI FI + big TV & DVD player. Only one wardrobe which is in the outdoor bathroom but apart from that we loved it & will stay again. The staff were friendly & attentive yet very concerned with not invading your privacy. Highly recommend
title: Seminyak Chic...

text: Ideal place for a family short trip and staffs are always ready to answer our enquiry. Housekeeping is tip top n they really help to make us feel coszy at all time, overall I would say Ziva villa is a nice n coszy place for short trip. Always remember to ask for insect repellent from the staffs.
title: Nice and coszy, friendly and approachable staffs.

text:
240 sq m of your own space in Seminyak! Ziva is one of the more spacious villas that we've been to, with a great layout and very minimalistic/ clean concept which we believe can be easily acceptable to most people! 
What worked:
- Friendly staff (Kadek was our butler and he sure made sure our stay is fully taken care of)
- Concept (clean, minimalistic, warm, with touches I will gladly incorporate into my own home)
- Pool (practical size, clean, you will definitely swim in it)
- Value for Money (price of room, good room service food at good prices, massages)
- Bed (best sleep we've had in any hotel, sure to rejuvenate tired souls)
- Location (5 mins walk to Oberoi St)

Loved it so much we booked it again for our last night in Bali before returning home! Great place!
title: Timeless Concept - Excellent value for money

text:
Booked the 3 bedroom villa. One word to describe it - filthy!!!! 

• Cleanliness of pool and toilet - the pool is filthy and it seems that the water was even murky. Would appreciate if the pool was cleaned regularly as the tiles are stained. The toilet and shower floors were also dirty with marks all around.  

• Cleanliness of kitchen facilities - the kettle was filthy and stained… the water in the dispenser seems to be stale… utensils were sticky… We did not dare drink the breakfast tea that was served with the water obtained from the dispenser and boiled from the kettle. 

• Cleanliness of rugs in the room - obvious stains were seen and the rugs look like they have not been cleaned for years. 

• Sliding doors - not a big deal but the doors are difficult to open/close 

• Dim lighting to the villa - we had to turn on our phone torchlights to navigate from entrance to our villa. The floor was also uneven which means we had to take greater care when walking at night

• Dim lighting in the villa - we wanted to chill by the pool at night but the light was too dim. Would be good if we had options to adjust the exterior lighting! 

• Limited power sockets, we had to unplug the existing applicances to charge our devices. The outlets were also located UNDER the bedside tables and was very inconvenient (had to squat to look under the table)

• Restricted breakfast timing - unsure why our breakfast timing cannot clash with another guests’? If we had a party of 20 staying in the same facility (all different villas), does that mean we have to stagger breakfast timings and are unable to leave the facility at the same time? What’s odd is also how the villa was catered for 6 pax but we were told only 2 pax was entitled for floating breakfast! Although the staff did deliver for 4 pax eventually but it was just an odd rule…. 

• Mosquitoes - understand that this may be out of the villa’s control and i appreciated that there was fumigation during our stay but there were just too many of them. I got at least 10 bites during my stay here

Very disappointed that the villa was in a bad shape as compared to the photos online… We were looking forward to our stay there but had to make do with what was given. Also the villa does not seem to be 600m2? Not sure if it was a matter of perspective but it looked 300m2 at most
title: Filthy

Breakfast was basic but nice - plenty of other options to purchase close by in Eat St which is a 5 min walk.  Room service was great, used for lunch and drinks only. text: This was our 2nd stay at Ziva in the last 6 months, and we had a great stay once again.  Staff are friendly and very helpful.  The Villas are lovely, great amenities and nice size pool!  We have no problems recommending Ziva, and this will be our home away from home when we come to Seminyak. The breakfast is great, although there are so many great places to eat in Seminyak we only had breakky twice. Its literally a 5 min walk to Seminyak Square, and there is a convenience store across the road, and the spa next door, Chiara is great and cheap.  We spent every morning and night there.  The only disappointing thing was that we had requested a late checkout, and had to be out by 12pm.  Last time we stayed we had a 2pm late checkout.  I also went online to see if there were any villas available to book for that night and there was, so I was disappointed we couldnt get a 2pm checkout again, esp as this was our 2nd stay.  Overall though, a great stay!
title: We Love Ziva

text:
Before I begin, I worked as an international travel agent for many years, and booked many Bali holidays. I know the qualities and standards of a four and five star property , and this property does not qualify. My partner and I were thrilled to find Ziva Villas online at a great sale price and jumped at the opportunity. I researched the area and the hotel, even read the reviews on TripAdvisor about the property. Sadly we could not have been more let down by the entire experience. 

The staff, well apart from check in, we barely saw any staff at the resort. If you did manage to see a staff member they would be gone moment later. They never smiled, it’s a shame because the staff make or break the experience. 

The breakfast, seriously don’t waste your time. It’s a VERY limited menu and everything is pre cooked when it comes to the villa. The toast and pastry basket was inedible as it was so stale. Revolver Cafe in Seminyak does an amazing breakfast and coffee, we ended up eating breakfast there towards the end of the holiday. 

The property is old, worn out and in need of some serious renovation. Our bathroom was dirty and had mojos growing around the shower. The furniture needs replacing and updating to something with a modern feel. 

The one thing the property has going for it is a massive pool, I’m talking huge. That was a wonderful feature. 

My partner and I are returning to Bali in November and unfortunately have booked another property to stay at, which is a shame because Ziva could be a 5 star getaway, but to get there they will need some serious improvement.
title: What a let down!!

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
We visit Bali around twice a year and always stay in Villas.  Ziva is ideally located just a few mins walk to Seminyak sqaure.  The villa itself is good size for a couple and its style is quite typical of mid range villas in Bali.  It's not the traditional Balinese style villa but more on the modern look.  The bedroom is a generous size, with a living area, comfortable sofa and bed and basic bathroom area.  The private pool is very decent, good size, enough for a few laps.  The staff at Ziva are very courteous and helpful which is very typical of the Balinese culture.  
Although Ziva was comfortable and served it purpose, I would like to point out some drawbacks:
1.  bathroom amenities were of poor quality.  Towels felt old, worn and rough.  Shower gel, shampoo etc in ceramic bottles are not practical.  impossible to hold with wet hands without the fear of dropping the bottles
2.  finishes were quite worn.  the bathroom cabinet doors couldn't shut properly
3.  sunbeds were too curved uncomfortable especially if you lie on your
     front.  Streneous on the back
4.  the pool deck is too narrow.  lots of plants which looks beautiful and tropical but didn't allow area to move the sunbeds around or even to walk around the sunbeds
5.  water pressure in the shower was very low
6.  walk way from reception to villa may look pretty, but because of the uneven tiles, it made walking a difficult task especially for women in heels!  the archway of plants needs trimming and maintenance ... not easy to walk through especially if you're 6ft.  I turned my ankle walking back to my villa on a rainy night!
Ziva villa rates are competitively priced.  For first timers to Bali and first taste of a Bali Villa, then consider Ziva
title: If location is your priority, then Ziva is perfect

text:
Booked this villa thru weddingku.com to celebrate our 19th anniversary, I bought the 3D/2N honeymoon package, includes airport transport vv, candle light dinner, picnic box, daily breakfast, minibar.
It’s a really honeymoon concept villa, each villa is very private, with a nice big room with all glass window, with a private big pool, nicely decorated for honeymooners. 
Staff is very warm and nice, the driver who picked us up from the airport is very friendly, the front desk staff greets us with name and everything is well prepared.
The path walk to villa is nicely and neatly arranged trees, thus giving the impression of beautiful and privacy.
Entering the villa, wow, everything is decorated with honeymoon mood. The bed, the bathtub, full of flowers and love shaped. The staff introduce us on the villas facilities and everything is set to our preferences; breakfast time, dinner time, picnic time etc.
Villa is located in the middle of Seminyak area, just a walk distance to Seminyak Square, lots of boutique and cafes along the road to Seminyak Square.
It’s really enjoyable 3D/2N for us, a very worth the money spent with all the facilities and ambiences.
title: Honeymoon mood

text:
I have recently returned from a 9 night stay with Ziva Villa's in there 3 bedroom villa. I was with 5 other friends who all found from the moment we were met at the airport to walking through the doors into our own little slight of heaven being villa 7 we knew we were in for an amazing time.

The central location to all the shops, restaurants etc made me concerned initially as I thought this would result in losing the privacy and there would be a possibility of noise however this was not the case. All villas were extremely quiet and peaceful. 

The villa was huge and the pool was even larger than expected. The villa was tended to daily and was spotless at all times thanks to the amazing housekeeping.

Every request we had during our stay was dealt with very promptly by the start who were all very friendly and helpful.

Breakfast was a very big thing for both myself and my friends and we were not disappointed. Large selection of breakfasts served at a time that worked for us.

On our last day we had to check out at 12:00pm even though our flight was at 11:05pm. Ziva staff were kind enough to offer all of us the use of a 1 bedroom villa so we had somewhere to remain until our airport transfer. This was an extremely kind gesture to which I am very thankful towards Ziva and its staff for.

WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND ANYONE TO STAY HERE.

I will be returning without a doubt.
title: Truly amazing Villa's

text:
Couldn't really fault this Villa.
Driver was at the airport waiting our arrival and they even dropped us of at our next location.
Bed was comfy. The breakfast which was cooked in the villa was Yum. Staff where so friendly and kept the ice buckets flowing for my drinks by the great pool and sun lounges.
Wifi was spot on. Best I have had in many travels to Bali.
Only thing I could pick is there's not a door on the toilet which wasn't really a problems but hey I like toilet doors.
Location was spot on right near Ultimo's and Seminyak Square. Perfect
Will definitely be going back again.
Thanks to all the Staff at Ziva for your Hospitality
title: Great service

text: Enjoyed my stay at Ziva but was especially wowed by the personal endeavor to go the extra mile by the front desk butler Agung who had made my stay a great experience. I arrived on a late flight, checking in almost midnight absolutely famished. Kitchen was closed but upon learning my predicament, Agung drove me into the city at 2am combing the streets for a restaurant still open, and finally introduced an eatery that only the locals go. Through my stay he also made great recommendations, lent me his own motorcycle and gave lessons and tips on improving safety on the road as a tourist rider. The villa was spacious, with a great private pool and a kitchen where a chef comes in to make your breakfast fresh each morning. An excellent retreat.
title: Excellent villa in heart of Seminyak

text:
We spent 3 days at Ziva villa after moving from another villa (The Seiryu) and I have to say it has been outstanding. As other reviews are stating, the villa is as the pictures shown on the website. Very cool design, with a huge swimming pool you can jump in straight from your bed. The room is basically a glass cube, no walls, just floor to ceiling windows and sliding doors, so extremely bright during the day, with all around curtains for your night time. Breakfast was excellent, cooked directly in front of you at the villa. Ingredients were top quality, with big variety of choices. Another cool factor is the bathroom and shower, which are completely open air next to your room and next to the pool. Pool is the biggest we have ever seen in a private villa. You can definitely swim and do lengths if you want to. Location is also a plus, given that the villa is less than 5 mins walk from JL Oberoi where all restaurants and shops are located (a bit far from the beach tough). 

TIP: we were given Villa N.2. We haven't seen the other villas, but the layout of this one is excellent with a big patio for sunbathing next to the pool.
title: Huge swimming pool villa

text:
Villas in Bali are generally over-priced. Ziva is really a gem. 

We stayed at the 3-bedroom villa which is very new and spacious. I visited the 2-bedroom villas but find that the 3-bedroom is of a better value. The pool and rooms are very clean. 

The only downside is that the kitchen does not provide good food. So walking out to get food will be a better option. For the breakfasts, you are better off opting for the Indonesian menu. The western food is really bad.
title: Excellent villa at a great price

text: Stayed for 3 weeks in Ziva Villa .. Our butler Augus was so helpful and friendly with us .. This was our second time to come to Bali and to Ziva .. One time isn't enough! We loved how our butler gave us information about the city and the best places and restaurants .. We took 2 full day tours with picnics and it was wonderful .. I would't mind coming to bali just to stay at Ziva Villa again! The location of the villa is really nice and close to the beach if you prefer walking .. No matter how much I can say I can never say enough .. Amazing from start to finish!
title: More than amazing

text:
We just came back from our trip to southeast asia (Thailand, Singapore and Bali) and stayed at Ziva a Boutique for 4 nights in Bali.  The villa was quiet, private and peaceful - exactly what we were looking for.  We loved having our own pool and private outdoor breakfast each morning which we had a choice of Balinese, American or Japanese - each filling and very enjoyable.  

The best part of our stay at the villa was our butler Eka. He did an amazing job keeping us comfortable and provided an excellent level of service by arranging anything we needed. He was very patient and worked with our last minute schedule changes and always arrived 15 minutes early to pick us up.  I would highly recommend him for any future guest's stay as he is very friendly and charismatic, making our stay very pleasant.
title: Eka, the BEST Butler at Villa a Boutique

text:
Before my bf & i went to bali we survey a lot of villa but at the end we choose ziva villa is because of the review of this villa is good and their private pool is huge. we stayed there for 3D2N, the villa a little bit hard to get found beausez of their signboard is difficult to be seen. The villa is exactly like the photo you saw from the photos and the private pool is real huge. The villa is clean and cozy.
