The driver rental cost us IDR450,000 for 5 hours, and IDR 50,000 for additional per hour. You may contact him when you need a personal driver in seminyak.
his name PUTU EKA , +62(0)87861370765 / +62(0)361737066
Beside transport service, he also willing to provide tour. 

The staff also willing to provide you drop off service which in seminyak area, and they help us to do the reservation for our restaurant too.

I will suggest you to do reservation of restaurant before you go unless they always full. for exp The Breeze restaurant in Samaya, SOS supper club, potato head. Especially on evening, because there are a lot of people went to those place i mentioned for dinner and drink with sunset view.

By the way, i not recommend to take taxi in Bali. Because they charge very expensive even though just a short distance, they are not following meter. That's the reason why i recommend rent a motorcycle or a driver is better.

i fully recommend this villa, and i will come back again. 
Hope you enjoy in Ziva villa too, have a nice trip in Bali. =)
title: best villa in seminyak

photos.caption: chilling in the morning waiting for our breakfast
personal chef cook us breakfast every morning
nice villa with huge private pool (room 5)
semi outdoor huge bathtub which can fit two person. room 5

text:
My husband and I stayed at Ziva Villa for my birthday last year in Dec. it was the perfect place to spend our 4 days in. Even before we got there, I had a 101 questions which were ALL promptly, adequately and politely answered by one of their staff, Komang Inten. The service upon arrival was similarly immaculate. They greeted you, reminded you to place orders for breakfast, helped with our luggage when we checked out even though he was busily in the midst of doing something else. They also helped to arrange our day trip out to the beach from a brochure we got at the airport. The best part was that they leave you mostly alone so you don't see or hear their staff walking about much but they're always there when you need them. Even though it was 'peak' period, the only time we ever saw other guests was when we checked out of the hotel. We hardly even heard them though we did know there were others staying during the period. It was that private. 

We had 4 breakfasts and 2 lunches, all of which was good enough for us. We didn't have high expectations from reading others' reviews so I was pleasantly surprised. Our dinners were mostly taken at the restaurants about 10mins walk from the villa. 

The villa is absolutely BEAUTIFUL. If you like the pictures posted, what you see is what you get. Beautiful tranquil absolutely private pool, outdoor tub which looks up to the stars or sky, rain shower and comfy bed surrounded by glass looking out to the pool and greenery. The curtains can be drawn all around if you prefer it that way. You can literally roll from bed into the pool. TV channels were great too. I wish we didn't have wifi so we could disconnect but fortunately or unfortunately the wifi worked well. 

I didn't quite enjoy the massages so can skip that if you're not a fan. Besides that there is absolutely nothing I could complain about. (I'm not one who goes crazy over every ant or chipped glass. Who notices anyway.) I searched really long and hard coz i really wanted to enjoy our stay before I stumbled upon Ziva villa and knew it was definitely the place to be if it was as the pictures looked. I must say I'm extremely satisfied with our stay. In fact I'd recommend to spend the entire day in the villa rather than travel out. We went for a snorkeling trip to turtle island, this place called paradise island but it was not worth our time or money. The beach wasn't nice and the waters weren't clear. In fact I saw some jelly fishes and felt some stinging so we were up from the water in 10mins. 

We were a little worried about wet weather since it was in Dec but it only rained one afternoon for like 10mins and that was it. Overall, I'd totally recommend Ziva Villa for their beautiful, clean and private villa and for the wonderful service and staff. They should be way up there in Trip Advisor but I think they're probably still new so not that many ppl have discovered them yet. 

Thanks for the wonderful stay, Ziva! We'll be back!
title: The villa not to be missed

text:
We booked the place with the honeymoon package, so basically we got free 1.5hrs massage, free candle light dinner, breakfast at ur place, and other stuff. The place was so AMAZING with private pool next to ur bedroom, and they even covered the bath tub with flowers. 

However, the massage service was very poor, and they served terrible food at candle light dinner and breakfast.. the food is definitely not 5-star quality. And i still can hear the sound of motorbike, car, and people talking from outside our villa, so it's not so private, but still tolerable though. 

Restaurant tips: You dont have to worry finding good restaurants and cafes. You can reach them within 5-10 minutes walk. Eg. Rumours, Ultimo, Trattoria, Mykonos, etc
title: Great place, but...

owner_response.text:
Dear Knight Raven,

Greeting from Ziva a Boutique Villa,

We really appreciated that you have get more suggestion and advised for our attraction increasing and upgrading of our services and product.
It will realized improved of our product and services on the future, and please do not hesitate to contact us directly for your any suggestion and some advices that you need implemented improved of our product and services.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This private villa comes with a pool, kitchen, nice garden and a huge bathroom (outdoor). This is by far the best accomodation i stayed in throughout all my holidays. There are only 7 villa in this hotel so you will have alot of privacy. The service you get here is 5-star. We tried the in-room massage and the in-room dining which were excellent as well. It was a wonderful experience and will come back again.
title: Excellent

text: First time I stepped to this villa. I'm a bit dissapointed and thought I choose a wrong villa for good time relaxtion accomodation. Because a design of a front desk a bit to simple and old. Plus they didn't served a welcome drink when we waited for a check in process. I WAS WRONG, they did gave us a welcome drink inside our villa when they showed us our villa. The villa itself was amazing and clean. Each villa got a big swimming pool as well not like other villa that I ever stayed before. The foods not a 5 stars but not bad. Customer service was great without any fault. Highly recommended.
title: Amazing villa

text:
This place is amazing!  We have stayed at a lot of nice places over the years, but nothing compares to our room at the Ziva Boutique Hotel.   Each room is a private courtyard with trees, plants, swimming pool, outdoor kitchen, and the bedroom suite.  The private pool wraps around the glass-encase room.  You step from your bed right into the swimming pool.

Each bathroom has a double-wide tube that fits two people.  The rooms look like a modern Manhattan apartment, but in a tropical setting with a pool.  The place was so nice that my wife chose not to leave our courtyard the first day.  It is so much nicer to relax within the your private villa.

There are only 7 villas.  Our room was spotlessly clean.  The staff is large (like most businesses in Bali) and all are very friendly and accommodating.  They come each morning to cook a private breakfast in your outdoor kitchen.  

From the hotel, it is an easy walk to all of the Seymenak shops.  

We really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend Ziva Villa.
title: A very special villa

text: Stayed at ziva last week in the 3 bedroom villa. It was amazing!! The staff are friendly and helpful, the location is less then a 5 min walk to the main street and the rooms are top class!! I had the best time their with my family. The pool is beautiful, and is the centre piece to the villa. We had the cheifs come and cook breakfast for us daliy. We felt like the royals. I would recommend this to everyone and anyone to stay here!!!
title: Ziva is AMAZING!!

text: We stayed at Ziva for two nights. Great location with eat street and shops in walking distance. Villa was clean and designed around the massive pool - roll out of bed into the pool.
title: Luxurious hideaway

text: We stayed a week at Ziva a Boutique Villa and couldn't have wished for a more romantic setting.  It truly was an oasis of calm as you stepped through the front door to the villa (no.2 Catula).  The pool was amazing, just the right temperature for all day and all night swimming, not too warm and just cool enough to be refreshing.  It's in a nice quiet part of Seminyak but close enough to walk to the shopping and restaurant strip (5 mins).  As a suggestion most taxi driver's have no idea where Ziva is, but if you tell them to go to Ultimo Corner it's easy to find from there.  Another reason it's so quiet is that the reception area is up a flight of stairs from the road and the villa's down a flight of stairs the other side, creating a buffer zone which helps take away traffic noise.  We found it very quiet and relaxing.  The staff never came in to clean the room while we were there, always waiting until we were out and about, so that made it really private.  If you want a romantic place to go just the two of you then this is the place to go.  BTW the toilet still leaks, but the water went away from the feet area!!! Just wear thongs.
title: Romantic Oasis

text:
We never had the chance to explore the local area on foot but getting a cab was never a problem and it was a very short drive to anywhere in Seminyak.

What we really appreciate about Ziva was the total seclusion and sense of serenity we felt the entire time we were there. It is a complex of around 7 villas and we never encountered any other guests so we were very surprised to learn that all of the villas were booked while we were there. 

The air conditioned living area/bedroom is tastefully furnished and large in area. There is a sliding door to the pool from the bedroom so you can literally roll out of bed and straight into the pool. The pool is a very generous size ( more than double the size of the pools at Pradha and Aria Villas). The shower in the outdoor bathroom has excellent water pressure too.

Breakfast was the standard breakfast seemingly served at all the villas in Bali. Staff at the front desk spoke good English and were very helpful in assisting us in making restaurant and spa reservations and getting us a taxi. 

I highly recommend this villa for couples wanting a boutique and designer villa that is in an excellent location offering total privacy.
title: Excellent value for money....with a massive pool...

photos.caption: View of the outdoor deck area

text: Great location in Seminyak, only a few minutes walk to boutique shopping and best restaurants. Has an awesome massive private pool! Villa is modern in design, clean and comfortable enough, but more dated and basic than others we stayed at. The towels in particular were pretty old and worn. Thought the layout was strange - the only steps out of the pool are into the bathroom so you cant easily go from pool to sunlounge area. Staff are friendly and helpful, the included breakfast is OK and kept us going til dinner, but the outdoor dining area is a bit shabby and you dont really feel like sitting around after eating. Highlights of things we did in the area - heaps of cool fashion boutiques in walking distance, eat at Ultimo, Rumours, breakfast at Ku De Ta, deus for coffee, nice cakes and pastries at Bali Bakery or Grocer & Grind, also check out Potato Head. Enjoyed tour to ubud monkey forest and kintamani volcano, villa arranged driver for 5 hours for US$45, goes wherever you want.
title: Good location, modern & clean, wow what a pool!

text:
We stayed 7 night at the Ziva, the first villa #2 had a leaking toilet and we were moved to #5 which also had an outside bathtub.
There's a large outside space between the bedroom, bathroom and pool, which would make and ideal place to place a small low table and couple of comfy chairs to enjoy an afternoon drink as the sun is setting. The food from room service was tasty and reasonably priced, though the breakfast became rather boring and if we change the order we did not get what we asked for.
The staff are very polity and friendly. The only complaint we had, and we made this known to the manager, is the bed linen was threadbare and some sheets had holes. The manager told us they were in the process of refurbishment soon. The photos on their web site are accurate, unlike other hotels. 
We would stay there again.
title: Nice villas and great pool.

text:
My first time staying in a pool villa.  So spoilt will never want an ordinary room again and this is no ordinary room!!!!  The night we arrived it was raining but they were there to greet us with umbrellas.. Check in was easy and we were guided to villa no. 4. The pictures on the Internet 
are  good but the real thing is soooo much better. The room was cooled by 2 airconditioners but you could turn one off if you wanted. The most comfortable bed and pillows I have ever had in all my travels in Asia. Could have slept all day but of course there was things to be done...eating at some fab restaurants, shopping and of course swimming in the beautiful, sparkling clean and quite large pool.  Breakfast was served in your outside kitchenette at a time that suited you. Choice was reasonable eggs, Indonesian breakfast. The staff never troubled you...always rang to see if you were ready for them to come to set up breakfast and did not service the room till you went out.  They provide a drop off service to places close by but if there is no driver available they will call a taxi. There is a booking fee by the taxi driver for this..easier to g et one in the street. Some nice restaurants on laksmana street... Turn right and you will find some restaurants one being Khiama...had tapas and dinner there and it was delicious.. Seminyak 
 square an easy walk away.  We often just got a taxi to where we wanted to go and walked back or vise versa so we weren't in the heat all the time...taxis are soo cheap. The whole time we stayed there we did not see another guest even though we knew they were there.  This is a beautiful villa and I was very sad to leave our own little oasis.  The staff remember you name which is also a lovely touch and they are so friendly and helpful.
title: Absolutely wonderful!!!

text: Ziva Villas is a nice villa complex that is fairly new but I think it will unfortunately start to show it age. Staff are friendly but not as well organised as some of the other more established villas. The pools are huge and the sun deck area is a really nice spot as gets plenty of sun but a tree also hangs over a section so shad is also available (Villa 4). Was nice to be able to order cocktails from the room service menu and the staff would set them up on the ledge by the pool so we had our own swim up bar. The villa complex is only a short walk from many great restaurants for lunch or dinner. Would stay at the villas again but think as they get older management might have to do some renovations.
title: Nice Villa Complex with a Huge Pool

photos.caption: Cocktails at our own swim up bar

text:
My husband and I took the Honeymoon package at two Villas in Seminyak, one of them is Ziva Villa. We just got married on Dec 17, 2011, so this is really our very first honeymoon. We stayed on Dec 30, 2011 - Jan 2, 2012 in Ziva Villa, and we LOVE every minute of it! We stayed at room 01-Elora, and we fell in love with the Villa the minute we entered it. It's so much better than the photos on their website! We loveeee the pool.. It's clean, clear, and quite big for two people, compared to the first villa we stayed in. The villa was also clean with a hint of modern facility, like plasma TV, rain shower, but it kept its nature feeling, too with a lot of trees. 

I seriously regret my decision to stay at the first villa for 5 days and at Ziva Villa for 4 days, because Ziva is sooo much better! You can listen to the rain falling down on the pool at the comfort of your air-conditioned bedroom, while watching movies on your bed. The spa package was also much better, since the therapist brought their own massage bed, instead of doing the massage/spa on your bed (the way we had it on our first villa). 

Even more awesome is the fact that you can find restaurant very easily.. Ultimo, Rumours, Trattoria, all are within walking distance, and they are affordable and so delicious. We simply love it, and we can't wait for another chance to stay at the villa - we might even bring our family to stay on the three bedroom villa! I seriously cannot stop singing thousand praises for Ziva. It's the perfect place to stay. 

Despite all the positive things, I do have some suggestions for newlywed if you want to stay at Ziva. There were two things that were slightly the let-down of our honeymoon: the food and the bugs. No no, the bugs won't bother you in terms of biting and flying around you, but all villas must do their fumigation, and unfortunately, this caused a lot of dead bugs on our wash bin after the fumigation (which is outside the bedroom, thankfully). So if you're afraid of bugs, you might wanna consider staying in a hotel rather than a villa, cause most villas are the same. 

The other downside was the food. We took the honeymoon package, so we got one time lunch and romantic dinner, with daily breakfast of course. In our opinion, the food was of an "okay" rate, and unfortunately, not on the same standard as 4 or 5 star hotel. Of course it is not apple to apple comparison, but you might wanna consider not taking the lunch and dinner if it will reduce the cost, and you can go out and walk to great restaurants nearby. Since the dining table is outside the room, unfortunately it's kinda hot and there were some small red ants on our table just minding their own business but can easily disturb you cause sometimes they went to your plate in search of food. However, you can opt to have your breakfast/lunch/dinner in the room, to avoid those heat and ants/fly. So no biggie on that one. 

One thing to note, though, they did an awesome preparation for the romantic dinner! It really-really was as seen on the photo, with two heart-shape giant bed of roses floating on the pool, while you are having romantic dinner with candlelight all around you. Absolutely romantic! So I didn't have any regrets on taking the romantic dinner, despite the so-so food, cause the decoration was unbelievable!

All in all, my heart really goes to this villa. If you want a wonderful honeymoon, you definitely should stay at Ziva.
title: Amazing Honeymoon at Ziva Villa - Truly Unforgettable

text:
In one word "Brilliant"!  We recently returned from our 5 night stay.  We loved everything about it.  It is exactly as in the photos and better...we were very happy when we saw it.  There are 5 one bedroom villas and one 3 bedroom villa in the complex.  Ours was villa #4 and we can't fault it. All the villas are slightly different but all excellent. Ziva is so close to the main strip of Seminyak.  Close to restaurants and shops.  You can even walk to the beach...but it is a good 15 minute walk.  The villa is very modern and so bright.  Very spacious too...Breakfast is good with enough variety and best of all it is cooked for you in the villa.  The staff are so friendly, Komang Inten, Agus, Eka, Dieta, our cook, the gardener...all so lovely.  We had a late flight out and they set up another villa for us when we returned from shopping to have a shower and freshen up before we headed off to the airport (we didn't even ask for it).  I would go back again in a heartbeat.  The free massage was just what we needed and we also enjoyed the romantic petal bath.  Wifi was great too.
We had a few cocktails as they were very reasonably priced (AU$7) but didn't have much of the room service.  I recommend a restaurant on the main strip called Khaima...every meal we had there (8 in total) we loved...except perhaps the seafood platter.  It is Moroccan but has asian and western food.  We loved the stuffed squid and chicken asian dishes.
I would highly recommed Ziva to couples as I am not sure how you'd go with small kids.  The 3 bedroom villa is amazing and huge...the photos don't do it justice.  
If you want to spoil yourself....go to Ziva.
title: Brilliant Ziva

photos.caption: Our villa lit up at night...beautiful!
Outdoor bathroom with romantic petal bath
Our bed done up for romantic bath package
Pool area and kitchen/dining area where we had breaky

text:
Stayed here in November for 2 days. The villa looks exactly as it is in their website, Beautiful and modern. Everything in the villa, from the bed, bathroom, pool to outdoor area is perfect. Food is average and affordable. Would prefer to walk to the main street for food. But the road to the main street is a little dark at night.

The staff were great and make the stay pleasant with their smile and help. But, we have a few hiccups with the service where:-
- we got complimentary 1.5hour massage, but the massage is very average
- we book for the massage at noon, but the therapist didn't show up. Called front desk and only then did they inform us that therapist wasn't available at noon. We waisted our time waiting for them in our room
- asked for cups to be sent to our rooms but it didn't come. Have to call them again to get cups sent to our rooms.

These are just minor problem, and would still highly recommend this place to everyone.
title: Great villa

text:
We were in Bali for a week, do decided to stay at two villas in Seminyak. After stepping in to Ziva on our first day, I regretted not staying here the whole week!!!  We had a free 1.5hour massage in our private villa to commence our stay.

The staff were absolutely wonderful!  From the reception staff to the chef who cooked our yummy daily breakfast in our villa to the gardeners, all lovely!!

The villa itself is very cool and contemporary. Bed is comfortable, good sized TV and great shower.... The private pool is MASSIVE!

The only downside to our stay was the wifi wasn't working, which made things a bit hard, but the staff were trying to get this fixed and called places we wanted to visit for us etc..

We highly recommend Ziva Villas!
title: Wonderful place to stay!!

text: My Husband and I stayed for 10 nights in total (broken up in the middle with a couple days in other spots around Bali.)I did a lot of research and chose Ziva based on the fact that it had a nice big clean pool, the bed and lounge looked comfortable and it was walking distance to Jalan Laksmana for food and shopping. Everything was perfect...The staff was super friendly and helpful. We asked for a large water dispenser and it arrived promptly, nothing was too much trouble. The breakfast was nice and fresh, room service was great and quick when we didn’t want to leave. There was a small local shop two doors down for any necessities to top up the mini bar. The Villa was very comfortable and had all that you could ask for. The only thing that we thought they could have done with was a movable towel rail so that we could dry our pool, bath towels in the sun, then we wouldn’t have needed fresh towels every day (they change them twice a day). I would highly recommend Ziva villas. Thank you Ziva staff for our fantastic stay in Seminyak, we will definitely be back...
title: EXCELLENT STAY AT ZIVA VILLAS

text: Wow this villa was much better than what we expected. Clean and spacious, excellent location, massive pool and to die for breakfast. We will be back :)
title: Loved it!!

text:
In a word - WOW.  As a self-confessed, spoilt Gen Y-er with impossibly high standards, I was impressed. 

We took a bit of a punt on this place, only being able to find 6 reviews on Trip Advisor, I would usually look for something with more of a 'repuatation', but the glowing reviews from travellers combined with photo's on the website just sold it to us. We also knew the location was great, very convenient, as we enjoyed exploring Seminyak on our last Bali trip (when we stayed in Legian).

From the moment we arrived we were impressed with the high standard of service from the friendly staff, the cleanliness, and the modern and tranquil setting. We found out the villa's are less than 1 year old, which explained their modern and luxurious feel.  The staff were exceptional, very polite and eager to help with any request. They were more than happy to answer any questions we had, lend us movies, arrange transport and scooter hire at the drop of a hat, and even came down the street to translate for us at a local shop.  The spaciousness of the villa was the best thing about it, it was HUGE.  The pool was large, a real pool, not a little one like a lot of places that advertise to be 'pool villas'. The outdoor bathroom was fantastic, sheltered but open.  It was very clean with great water pressure and modern amenities. Free Wi-Fi was fast and very convenient. Breakfast was cooked for us every morning, with our breakfast menu decided on the evening before.  It was delicious and there was a great selection to choose from.  In-villa spa treatments were available and the spa staff were fantastic also. This is something i am usually particularly picky about, especially hygiene (mani/pedi tools) and I was very impressed.

My partner and I usually aim to try new places each time we travel, however since we were unable to fault Ziva Villa we will making an exception and returning there next time. I have never written a review on here before but Ziva Villa was well worth the effort. I cannot speak highly enough of our experience there and would recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing/romantic escape with all the trimmings.
title: Exceeded all expectations

photos.caption: Pool, deck and outdoor kitchen (view from bathroom)

text:
What a fantastic experience we had at Ziva villas.
As soon as we cleared customs and walked outside, we immediately saw our name on a large white board held by our smiling driver Wayan,,, (aka john wayne)
He helped us to the car with our luggage and promptly offered us two ice cold towels and two ice cold bottles of water that he had been keeping cool for us in a small cooler box in the car. We wiped the hours of travel off our faces (Athens to Denpasar) and sipped our drinks while Wayan started the engine and Aircon before we got in, to cool down the car before we started our journey to Ziva.

On the way to the Villa, our driver was very helpful in answering any questions we had for him. He conveniently had a brother or cousin who was involved in almost any service that we might require during our stay. This was quite amusing. We did end up using him for a day trip to Ubud, and some easy river rafting in level 2 and 3 rapids. But for all our other needs such as in Villa Spa treatments, motorcycle hire, and transfers, we arranged everything through the wonderful team at Ziva. They were always the most reasonably priced, and we were always sure that service would be prompt and on time.

On our way to Ziva, we saw many reception areas for other villa complexes. They were all quite grand and luxurious. When we finally arrived at Ziva,,, there was no big grand reception area, no expansive sofas or sitting areas, just a simple set of stone stairs that led up and away from the road and parking area. At the top of the stairs we were greeted by a small stone Hindu statue of an elephant who sits in the middle of a shallow rooftop rock pool. The reception staff, butlers, and even the reservation manager who took care of our booking were all there to welcome us at check-in. We were seamlessly swept from the car through the reception and check-in process in about 4 minutes. The butler then invited us down a small flight of stairs that disappeared into a meticulously cared for tunnel of tropical plants and flowers. A green tunnel of jungle, thick with the scent of tropical flowers  that leads to each of the villas. At the entrance to our villa,,,, our butler turned to us and simply said welcome to your villa. He explained that the name of our villa SARGA,,, was a word from Sanskrit. As we entered our villa,,,, we really cant express the impact that we experienced. The photos on the website are just shadows of the real thing!
Wonderful, modern, minimalist design. The boundary between outdoor and indoor really has been erased!!!!!  Classy and elegant,,,, without any stiffness whatsoever. Casual and relaxed without being careless or ignorant. 

Our own little private paradise!!!!! Luxurious in it's simplicity. Quiet, peaceful, comforting, safe, inviting. All these descriptions really do fit with how we felt at Ziva. The pool was PERFECT!!!!!!! not an olympic sized monster, but not some oversized bath tub, but a real pool. Perfect for us to enjoy each other in the privacy of our own little world. We often literally rolled out of bed straight into the pool in the morning for a swim before breakfast. Then often after a long day, the last thing before bed was a midnight swim in the peace and silence.

The sleep experience was excellent. The pillows are the best i've ever slept on. The bed was great,, I give it 4 stars out of 5 for the mattress, but 6 stars out of 5 for the pillows. The internet wifi in our room was always strong in signal, and fast. The LCD flatscreen TV is huge, and the sound system with USB connection for ipod was great!!!!! Swimming in the pool with the doors of the main room open with some chillout sounds wafting into the pool from the sound system was heaven.

The towels were always fresh, fluffy and clean,,,,, and they smell GREAT.
The turn down service included them preparing electric mosquito repellers, as well as a very pleasant aroma therapeutic oil pot with candle burning underneath. 
Another interesting point,,,, as the main room is completely made of glass, the turndown service also includes the staff closing almost all of the curtains in the room. We however always opened them all back up! The lush plants flowers and ferns around the entire perimeter of our villa are subtly lit at night. We just loved the feeling of sleeping out in the open amongst the wonderful rich colors of our garden. So nice to feel open and exposed to nature, yet at the same time, enclosed and safe in the air-conditioned comfort of your suite.

The butler shares the post with two other young men. All of them are well spoken, well educated, and very good at looking after the guests without ever intruding. If we wanted to be waited on hand and foot,,,, we would have booked at the Samaya or the Legian. We however, wanted private luxury,,,, in a more independent, interactive enviroment. The butlers were always quick to respond,,,, but the secret here is that we really did not need them that often.

Two of the best places in Bali for  good Coffee are walking distance away, (Bali Bakery, Grocer & Grind). However for under 5 euros a day,,, a small scooter/motorcycle is a must. Good fun,,, and not too dangerous. Some great restaurants and bars for cocktails are all close by. But our best food experience was at a place called "Bali Sate" authentic Balinese food prepared in a 5 star kind of way. It is on the main road between the Legain and the Samaya. Ku-De-Ta,,, over-rated,,, over priced. For cocktails ok,,,, steer clear of the food.

We are already starting to plan our next trip.
We are also thinking of designing our own holiday home in Greece based on the same design brief as used in the Ziva concept.

To say "we loved it" would an understatement.
title: Our own private paradise.

photos.caption: Ziva our little elephant at the top of the stairs
Ziva outdoor bath tub by the pool

text:
We stayed at Ziva Villas for 5 nights recently and really loved our stay.  We chose it mainly because of the large private pool as well as the location to one of the two main streets of Seminyak. Overall I would recommend this villa to others. In summary:

Pros:
-Very private – villas are surrounded by high walls on each side
-Boutique – theres only 6 villas in the establishment
-Massive lovely clean private pool in the villa with deck and sunbeds
-Very modern inside with living space, bed, tv
-Extremely comfortable pillows – the best I’ve ever slept on
-Butler service – this really is just dial 0 for reception and whoever is there helps you
-Fantastic location - 5 minute stroll to one of the main streets of Seminyak so therefore very close to restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets.  But far enough away that its very quiet in the Villa
-In walking distance to Seminyak Square and Ku De Ta.
-Staff will come into your villa each morning and cook you breakfast in the outdoor eating area.  Breakfast was huge and great value.
-Spa/massage prices were pretty good.  1 hour Balinese massage was $15 US, and 1.5 hour treatment was $30US.  They come to your villa.
-Staff were friendly, polite and helpful.
- free internet.

Cons:
-There aren’t any facilities to prepare your own food – while there is an outdoor eating area, this consists of table and chairs and kettle and tea cups.  There aren’t any plates or water glasses for drinking – if you want to drink something you need to use a tea cup. Same goes if you plan on drinking wine in the villa or by the pool. No milk is provided for the tea and coffee facilities.
-Outdoor bathroom is pretty plain and the shower is kind of damp and dingy.
-Concrete flooring is throughout the villa, and it has water stains.  Not a big deal really.
-Occasionally the staff didn’t understand English much, so some times and orders for things were a bit mixed up.
- Villa was very concrete - is in need to more and established plants to hide the bare walls.
- no iron.
title: loved the villa, massive pool, 5 mins walk to seminyak - we would recommend

text: Lees de reviews, de meeste kloppen: dit was ooit een eerste klas resort, maar het heeft een grondige opknapbeurt nodig. Het management weet dit, zegt er in de commentaren op reviews werk van te zullen maken, maar doet dat niet en laat foto’s van jaren geleden nieuwe gasten aantrekken. Intussen maakt de vriendelijke en behulpzame staf voor een heel laag loon veel goed. Je zou het een Bali ziekte kunnen noemen, want we hebben intussen veel resorts, villa’s en hotels bekeken en het is elders niet veel beter. De prijs (165€/nacht) /kwaliteit klopt niet meer, zeker voor Indonesië. Maar goed, we hebben het hier best naar ons zin gehad tot we een nieuw gebouwde villa vonden voor 30% minder geld
title: Was ooit prachtig

text:
スミニャックスクエアまで歩いてすぐです。
バリ島ではどこに泊まってもスタッフさんはプロだなと感じますがここも例外ではなかった。とても親切です。
プライベートプール横にキッチン、ダイニングテーブルがあるものの、アウトサイドにソファやテレビがなかったことが少し残念。
この時期には珍しく天気に恵まれなかった為、折角のとても広いプールも勿体無く感じた。
プールの水はとても綺麗でした。
広さは155cmの私が平泳ぎで15かき。
アフタヌーンティーは2度いただきましたが2日とも同じチョコレートケーキでした。
バスタブも広く、水圧も完璧。
ミニバーは安いですし、ルームサービスも安い。
部屋の敷地内にフランジパニの木が2つ生えていました。もう少し自然を感じられるヴィラだったらもっと良かった。
目の前の道にはブルーバードタクシーが沢山通りますが、渋滞に捕まるのでウーバーの方が使い勝手がいいです。
title: ロケーションは良い

text: Alors pour commencer l'accueil désagréable, la personne qui nous a reçu nous a laissé attendre pendant 3h dans une pièce alors que la villa était dispo aucun moyen de négociation c'est limite on le dérangeait. L'état de la villa laisse à désirer pour le prix il faut fuire, piscine sale. Moisissures fourmis partout même sur la table a manger ainsi que les wc. Sans parler des moustiques. Ayant déjà pris d'autres villas sur seminyak celle ci me laisse un goût amer
title: Horrible a fuire!!

owner_response.text:
Dear Ben S,

Firstly We would like to thanks for your kind review givens, and it the most motivated to upgrade of our system and our control.
When we check it, we got the story which you were arrived at 12.05 noon when there were check out time, and our staff was inform you that the checking time at 14.00.
All of the villas fully booked since the previous night and  need spend more than 1 hour to prepare and cleaning up before check in up into the unit.

Would you like to explain us regarding of pool dirty detail, it happen within check in process or the next day in the morning, due we are doing double checking before guest check in, and we have frangipani tree at beside of pool which every morning the fragipani flowers will down and it will look dirty.

Every morning also the Housekeeping staff will clean the room and villa or based on guest available to clean the villa, and also doing checking up every evening before guest go to the bed. we have two times cleaning the room and the villa.

About the mosquitoes, as per villas designed which 50% open area landscape and private pool, we avoid to minimize of mosquitoes with fogging system two time every week surround of villas, and always mention to the guest to keep the door close at evening time to avoid mosquitoes get into the room.

We would like to thanks for your accommodation stay at Ziva a Boutique Villa and hope to get you have returning back to Ziva a Boutique Villa.

text:
Nous sommes restés 8 nuits et nous en sommes ravis. La villa correspond exactement au descriptif et aux photos: elle est moderne, ouverte complètement sur la piscine, le mobilier est dans le style scandinave, la salle de bains à l'extérieur. 
La piscine est vraiment immense, au moins 10x4 mètres! Elle est ensoleillée du matin au soir (du moins la villa nº4). 
Comme évoqué sur certains commentaires, elle nécessiterait un peu de rafraîchissement (peinture des murs extérieurs, toilettes,...) mais cela ne nous a pas gêné du tout. 
Le petit déjeuner est quant à lui moyen. On a préféré le prendre à l'extérieur. On est à 1km de la rue principale ou se trouvent tous les restaurants. 
Le personnel est très gentil, et a toujours répondu positivement à nos demandes. 
On reviendra très certainement la prochaine fois.
title: Vraiment super!

text:
Das Wichtigste zuerst: Es handelt sich bei diesen Villen um einen echten Pool! Maße zirka L10xB3xT1,5m. Man kann also mehr machen, als nur zu plantschen. Das ist auch gut so, denn der Indische Ozean ist schon gut 20 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt.
Die Villa ist sehr modern gehalten (kein Bali-Stil). Viele Glasfronten mit schöner Ausstattung. WC, Waschbecken und Dusche befinden sich witterungsgeschützt ausserhalb der Villa. Die Villa selbst ist mit einer Sitzecke, großem Doppelbett (Villa 3) 2x Sideboard, Kleiderschrank mit Safe (im Badbereich), Flat-TV, Musikanlage und zwei getrennt steuerbaren Klimaanlagen ausgestattet. Eine Minibar ist vorhanden. Es werden täglich Wasserflaschen kostenfrei angeboten. Das Frühstück wird zur Wunschzeit in der offenen Küche (befindet sich vis a vis der Villa) zubereitet und serviert. Für den nachmittag wird eine Teatime kostenfrei angeboten. Alle Mitarbeiter sind sehr zuvorkommend und aufmerksam. Alle Fragen wurden kompetent beantwortet, unsere kleinen Wünsche erfüllt. Serviceleistungen wie SPA, Transfers, Touren, Laubdry sind im Hotel buchbar. Eine der Hauptstraßen von Seminyak mit vielen Geschäften, Restaurants und SPA ist in 5 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen. Gegenüber der Villenanlage ist ein kleiner Supermarkt mit Geldautomat.
Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und waren immer wieder erstaunt, wie ruhig es wurde, wenn man die Anlage betrat und den Trubel Bali's hinter sich lassen konnte.
title: Traumhafte Poolvilla in ruhiger Lage

text:
在這度過了舒服的四個晚上，服務人員非常的友善及給予協助，可以幫助代訂餐廳、spa和叫車，
游泳池蠻大的，房間可以直接進到泳池，晚上游泳還可以看到星星，
環境乾淨舒適，離鬧區走路五分鐘就到了，非常方便，
雖然離鬧區很近，但住起來卻蠻安靜的，
房間裡有附音響，但可惜沒有blue tooth的功能，帶條音源線就可以用手機播音樂了，
早上用餐時容易被太陽照到，食物蠻好吃的，咖啡則是普通，
整體上而言，是個很不錯的選擇。
title: Cozy Place
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
허니문으로 지바 빌라에 있었습니다.
풀빌라는 처음이라서 신났었는데
막상 가보니 사진과는 다르더군요..
사진에서는 정말 깔끔하고 새건물 같아보였는데
실제 건물은 낡아서 실망했습니다.
샤워기 수압도 너무 약하고 고장났는지 물이 고루 나오지도 않고..

직원들은 정말 친절했습니다.
조식은 아침에 직원들이 들어와서 밖에있는 주방같은 곳에 차려놓고 가는데
샌드위치 한조각에 과일 조금과 커피를 주더군요.
공짜 조식이니 뭐 그러려니 했습니다.
침대랑 방은 깔끔하고 괜찮았습니다.
걸어서 5~10분이면 중심가에 갈수도 있어 위치도 좋았어요.
근데 공항에서 택시타고 주소 보여주니 택시기사도 잘 모르는 중심가 뒤쪽 골목에 위치하고있습니다. 밤에는 인적이 별로 없어 밖에 나가기 무서웠습니다.

그래도 친절한 직원들 덕분에 편하게 지내다왔어요.
풀빌라치고는 적당한 가격이었으나 시설은 딱 그 가격만큼인거 같아요.
시내에 있어서 비싼 거였나? ^^;;
title: 실제로 보면 뭐 그다지..

text:
Ziva villas  est une adresse à recommander. Les appartements -villas sont très spacieux avec des piscines privées ; le design est très étudié et le service extrêmement attentif. Le petit déjeuner vous est servi dans votre villa par un chef qui vient cuisiner dans votre cuisine ; c'est très agréable . De plus Ziva est parfaitement placé proche de la rue commerçante 
de Seminyak.
title: Villas design, emplacement idéal

text:
Na 5 hotels wilden we niet meer verkassen en daarom een week ziva villa geboekt. Na aankomst werd ons medegedeeld dat het watersysteem niet werkte en we daarom de eerste twee dagen naar iets anders moesten. We hadden sterk het vermoeden dat de villa voor een zeer hoge prijs dubbel was geboekt. We waren , zacht uitgedrukt, niet amused, maar, de vervangende,  Maca villa was geweldig!
Ziva villa is heel ruim, mooi ingericht, prachtig groot zwembad. Ligt een paar minuten lopen van de oberoistreet, dus dat zit allemaal goed. De minpunten: ondanks dat het personeel in de villa het onbijt bereidde, was het ontbijt ronduit slecht. Vriendelijke, maar totaal onprofessioneel personeel. Een keer in de villa geluncht, was meer dan goed. Daarbij komt, dat we niet zo gek zijn wanneer al het badgebeuren, sanitair buiten is, ondanks dat het er mooi uitzag. We zullen hier niet zo snel terugkomen.
title: Mooie villa met minpunten

text: 現場跟網路照片一模一樣，窗籩連接泳池，泳池連接浴缸。床鋪非常舒服，空間很大四周都是落地玻璃，住在裡面相當舒適。 離seminyak很近，建議租摩托車行動，隔壁就可以租車。very nice !
title: 非常值得一住！

text:
Nous avons séjourné 5 nuits dans la villa n°7 (la plus grande) avec un couple d'amis.
L'endroit est très joli, bien placé dans Seminyak (c'est à Kerobokan en fait), et à environ 30 min de l'aéroport de Denpasar.
Les villas sont jolies, la piscine est immense (environ 50m2), et le staff est agréable. 
Le petit déjeuner est assez basique, rien d'exceptionnel et ne varie pas d'un jour à l'autre... c'est un peu dommage car au bout de 5 jours, on commence à en avoir marre !
Le point positif c'est qu'il est servi dans la cuisine extérieure de la villa et préparé sous nos yeux. 
Les chambres et salles de bain sont spacieuses et jolies, en revanche, ce n'est pas très "ergonomique" : pas de porte serviette, très peu d'éclairage dans la salle de bain, ...
2 points ont entaché notre séjour : 
- nous étions 4 pour une villa de 6, nous nous sommes donc permis de prendre une serviette dans la chambre inoccupée, le lendemain... cela a été un vrai drame, d'abord accusé d'avoir perdu la serviette, ils sont venus checker dans la villa s'ils ne la trouvaient pas, et se sont mis à compter toutes les serviettes de la villa en notre présence ... bref, un vrai sketch pour une serviette qu'ils avaient ramassé la veille au soir ...  
- le dernier jour, nous avons malencontreusement cassé un verre dans la villa. Quelle n'a pas été notre surprise de le voir facturé sur notre note !! 50.000 Rp (soit environ 5 €)
C'est 2 anecdotes ne sont pas du tout à la hauteur d'un établissement à plus de 600 $ la nuit ... c'est vraiment dommage de finir sur une note négative...

Bref, c'est un bel endroit mais le service n'est pas à la hauteur du prix ...
title: Bel endroit...

text:
Volvería una y mil veces a esta hotel, estuvimos súper a gusto.
La villa era una pasada, la piscina enorme, la cama muy cómoda, la tele gigante, el sofá muy chulo y todo para nosotros solos, era muy espacioso y siempre estaba muy limpio.
La decoración muy moderna y minimalista.
Estuvimos cinco noches, y tuvimos un trato inmejorable.
Que bueno estaba el zumo de sandia!!!

El baño estaba fuera de la villa, también era muy grande. Si tengo que decir algo que no me gustó es que siempre teníamos que entrar y salir cada dos por tres, y cerrábamos en seguida la puerta para que no entrasen los mosquitos, pero no vimos ninguno, ya que cuidan bastante eso, todos los días echaban insecticida con una máquina.

No habían armarios en la habitación, también estaba fuera, en el baño, pero dejamos las maletas dentro, porque había mucho espacio.

Tanto nos gustó que a la semana volvimos otra vez, quitando dos noches de Ubud.
Estaba muy céntrico!!!

Tenéis que ir, es muy recomendable!!!!
title: Una pasada!!!

text:
Moi et mon mari avons passé 5 nuits dans l'une des villa avec piscine privée en septembre 2011. Ce fut le meilleur "hotel" que nous avons fréqenté sur tout notre séjour à Bali. Tout était très propre (ils venaient nettoyer pendant notre absence), le personnel très amical, le petit déjeuner était bon (pas extraordinaire mais bon), je vous conseille leur nouille (mie goreng). La piscine était agréable et donnait juste sur la chambre, ce qui fait que nous puvions tremper nos pieds dans l'eau depuis la chambre ^^.  Bien que le prix soit un peu cher, par rapport au standing, il est très abordable, un consei: réserver bien à l'avance car les prix grimpent.

Je le conseille fortement pour un couple, en amoureux, le cadre est tres romantique et calme.
title: chic, agreable
